texts: why you should still search instagram by hashtag even in 2025 lets be honest finding new content on instagram isnt as easy as it used to be reels promote a ton of random accounts sure but when it comes to regular feed posts instagrams algorithm tends to prioritize what you already follow thats where hashtag searches still come in handy you can use them intentionally not just to browse trends but to actually grow your network or understand your niche better heres why doing a proper hashtag search is still worth it 1 discover new content searching by hashtag helps surface the biggest posts within your niche its one of the simplest ways to find fresh pages worth following or ideas that can inspire your next post 2 meet influencers and creators if youre managing a brand or building one hashtag searches help you spot influencers who already connect with your target audience its basically free market research for partnerships 3 see whats trending locally try exploring locationbased hashtags like manilacreators or lagunaphotography its an underrated way to tap into your local scene and see which communities are most active 4 find the most popular tags when you search hashtags instagram also shows how many posts use them the more relevant and popular your tags are the more likely your content is to appear in others explore pages 5 check out the competition tag searches can show you which creators or brands youre sharing keyword space with its a small but powerful seo trick just applied to instagram instead of google 6 build real connections hashtag searches arent just for stats they can lead to genuine connections engaging with others under the same tags can help you build community and visibility at the same time 7 spot emerging trends early if you filter hashtags by date or engagement youll notice patterns fast like which styles sounds or formats are picking up steam in your niche staying updated gives you a creative edge so yeah even with instagrams algorithm doing most of the recommending now manual hashtag searches are still one of the most effective ways to find learn and grow fyi ive been testing this in our subreddit discussions too seeing which hashtags people follow or engage with actually mirrors what performs best on instagram itself its kind of wild how consistent that pattern is

comparing knowledgemanagement tools flowith vs obsidian vs kuse recently i have been exploring several hot knowledgemanagement apps overall i am going to ramp up my use of kuse keep an eye on flowith for the longterm and drop obsidian 1 the key advantages of kuse are the folder structure and infinite canvas the canvas design is perfect for people likes roamstyle thinking as i do great for divergent ideas also its so easy to manage all projects via folders it feels like i am organising my computer files on my desktop freely classifying moving merging and i can drag all kinds of files into kuse have it analyse organise and visualise the data i can also share my knowledge base with others the downside theres a usagespace limitation 2 flowith is overall a elegant and fun product and its pretty powerful as well youve got internet search imagetextvideo generation modes a neat comparison mode same question answered by multiple ai models and what i find really handy the oracle mode this agent mode is great because it shows the whole workflow you can supervise and tweak it the results are more controllable and its not much laggy the downside its paytouse and access is a bit tricky 3 the issue with obsidian is that to use largemodels you need to supply your own api token and the whole system relies heavily on pluginmarket offerings for various functions the benefit is high playability but for people like me who wants to have a easy start the learning curve and a little bit tricky

29m looking for genuine friendship someone real not perfect hello im a 29m from brazil probably feeling the summer heat right now im here hoping to find someone honest and loyal with whom we can build a warm and trusting friendship a bit about me im somewhere between introvert and extrovert more extroverted online i work from home so im almost always available im a bit nerdy and passionate about technology scifi retrofuturism cyberpunk science history space and asian cultures im also interested in other cultures i love watching youtube videos and exploring aesthetically pleasing content i enjoy talking about life the world random thoughts jokes and deep topics i like exploring many things and sometimes jump between topics quickly its just how my mind works i value genuine friendship and invest fully when it is mutual i also plan to do a lot of selflearning to improve my english and math and studying together on a call would be fun what i value and what im looking for i am honest open and value reciprocity and loyalty in friendship i dont mind having multiple friends as long as i have at least one genuine connection mutual support is important to me when i connect with someone i genuinely want to get to know them and invest my time meaningfully i am centrist politically not religious and appreciate real respectful and openminded people i dont drink im not into parties and i dont have many friends which is why im here what i miss most are real hearttoheart conversations i want someone with whom we can chat about little things send stickers for no reason share our day watch tv series together and spend time on voice calls someone curious and creative who actually listens and cares trust respect and meaningful bonds matter deeply to me voice or video calls are welcome once we build trust friendship if something more grows naturally later thats fine but honesty and clarity from the start are important if you are 2133 emotionally available kind genuine and openminded able to maintain dialogue ask questions and invest in a mutual friendship feel free to reach out i did my best to fix my grammar and my post is very genuine if you actually read this your message will not be ignored generic messages like hi or hello will be ignored tell me a bit about yourself and what caught your attention in my post

seeking second reader for an ethnographers retelling of bobas time with the tusken im in need of a second reader for a strange novel that wrote happy to swap chapters id love to swap chapters actually here is the teaser for the novel during his years among the tuskens boba fett lives alongside aten the tall warriorpriestess dressed in black who took boba under her wing nira the precocious child who reaches for him in both joy and grief and turok the warrior who mistrusts outsiders my attempt at a novel explores bobas path to leadership and how he was influenced by the untold lives of the tusken characters seen in the book of boba fett book 1 of what im thinking will be a fourpart fett space series books 3 and 4 will tentatively take place after boba becomes daimyo accidentally ended up being part space odyssey part ethnography part love story an anthropologists reimagining of bobas years with the tusken tribe think geertz by way of dune boba is basically doing fieldwork on tatooine and the novel is ethnography in disguise the novel is an admittedly unusual meditation on survival rebirth restorative justice feminine rage and its a slowburn romance too it gets spicy but is tasteful my aim was to lovingly fill the gap between the sarlacc and boba becoming daimyo you can expect tusken culture some romance and the galaxys most feared man learning how to braid a childs hair

ai in real estate discussion how are you using it in your business ai isnt replacing agents its elevating them from automating listing descriptions to creating personalized marketing content tools like chatgpt sora 2 galaxyai and perplexity are helping real estate professionals work smarter not harder so lets talk how are you using ai in your business right now which tools or workflows have made the biggest impact are you using ai for video branding client communication or data analysis what tasks have you automated that save you serious time each week this thread is a space to trade ideas share tools and learn from each other whether youre a beginner exploring prompts or already building your own automations why i started this conversation i recently spoke on the panel real estate ai unlocked how to use ai to do more with less at the little rock realtors association alongside glenn cunningham brett pope and langston carr a discussion focused on how arkansas agents are using ai to simplify daily workflows streamline marketing and stay ahead in a techdriven market that conversation confirmed one thing ai isnt a trend its the next big toolbox in real estate your turn if youre a realtor investor or creative entrepreneur whats one ai tool prompt or automation thats changed your workflow for the better lets build a resource hub right here in the comments something other agents can learn from and apply today

why a 4th age could be all about spying and diplomacy heres a quick bunch of ideas ive had about why an hypothetical 4th age could come along major diplomacy reworkaddonsupdates basically civ 7 made the choice of creating actionintensive eras that guide focus as such i antiquity initial land and ressourcebased settling and regional wars with angry neighbours ii exploration new golddriven expansion territorial consolidation and heavily naval economic warfare highlighted by the recent addition of piracy iii modern extension of the warlike phenomenon in terms of 1 geography ideologies can put you at war with civilizations across the world break up alliances and reconcile longterm enemies and 2 technology you no longer focus on land or naval units but on all fields including air units in my opinion these 3 ages accurately caricatured real world history with a focus on warfare for the sake of gameplay in this configuration each age helps constructing the story of how strong technological progress brought lasting societal changes roads and locomotion bringing a reduction of distances an early globalization interconnection of countries through trades and mutual dependencies and the industrialization of war which ultimately led to a fragile and eurocentric hope for peace and since modern age ends with the hbomb space conquest world fair or world bank lots of us have speculated the next age could be an atomicinformation era focusing on the cold war in such a case i can only imagine some major diplomatic changes because diplomacy is currently incomplete spying is not very deep or interesting it costs a lot of influence for a reliable but almost useless onetime boost to science or culture with no way to buff success rate city states cannot be turned around leading to a status quo after the first 30 turns of an age there are too few ways of making friends and too many ways of making enemies city trading is not available and peace treaties only offer settlement exchanges instead of financial reparations you cannot free cities and give them back to their original founders civs or city states so basically influence spying and diplomacy are cruelly lacking and thats exactly what the reallife atomic age was all about hence why i believe an hypothetical atomic age would necessarily come with a reform of diplomacy which could resemble something like this iv atomic 1 much less official wars and conquest because of deterrence the fear of ai using weapons of mass destruction could calm you down the mere impact a weaponized conflict could bring to a countrys economy and infrastructure would not be worth warring huge costs and damages that lead to a lag behind countries at peace reduction of worldwide trade diplomatic isolation and sanctions etc cities conquered could be desolated and suffer big debuffs because of expansive infrastructures being destroyed by war or by nukes lack of local population support for conquest because of lasting national identities you cant imagine a modern day city accepting a sudden ownership change introduction of a resistancelegitimacy mechanic that could lead to unrest in previously or recently conquered settlements rewarding peaceful players from previous ages for not conquering settlements or for freeing them a sole player could still attempt to conquer the world but it would become extremely difficult because of nuclear detterance and worldwide opposition forcing war gameplay to rely on infrastructure sabotage information and counterspying 2 more emphasis on cold war and teamwork no direct conflicts but the continuity of ideologies from modern age polarized enemies could race as teams for an ideological victory incentivizing teamwork and world developmentcooperation over war and isolated runs more emphasis on big advanced players helping out smaller civilizations if they share the same ideology creating a common destiny between the modern and atomic ages you fought alongside in the world wars now you help each other economically culturally scientifically towards hegemony 3 rewarding of peaceful playstyles with the creation of a diplomatic victory for wars avoided cities freed or agreements concluded 4 new diplomatic interactions introduction of new influence buildings such as spy academy ministry of information embassies etc making spying more complete allowing ways to turn city states around allowing more peace treaty options

do you think design still belongs to everyone lately ive been thinking about how narrow our idea of good taste has become most of what we call beautiful fashion interiors even digital design still comes from a small group of people with the access language and training to define whats good but beauty at its core comes from emotion from how something feels not just how it looks imagine if design started from stories and emotions shared by ordinary people and not from trend reports or moodboards what would that world look like what emotion do you wish could become something tangible a color a form a texture we just started a small reflective space called raestheticcommons to explore that question about emotion collective creativity and democratizing beauty its still new and quiet but if this idea resonates with you wed love to have your thoughts there

city of madison interested in expanding market and community gardening the city of madison is seeking to gauge interest in utilizing cityowned land for market and community garden spaces this week the economic development division launched a request for expressions of interest via a short survey intended for entrepreneurs market farmers and organizations involved in community or market gardening and interested in expanding food access and assisting madison families with food affordability needs the city is trying to understand if growers and community food systems organizations have interest in and capacity for expanding market gardens and community gardens in madison we are calling on community gardeners farmers urban ag enthusiasts and anyone interested in local food production to help us collect ideas and input said mayor satya rhodesconway the city of madison is very interested in using cityowned land to make our local food systems more sustainable and robust please help us with this first step of exploring how the city can partner with the farming and gardening community to increase local food production take the survey at wwwsurveymonkeycomrwrx5v5n this request for expressions of interest is the first step before the solicitation of formal proposals from qualified individuals and organizations

discord daggerheart async looking for 23 players for my new campaign nouement nouement n the bittersweetness of having arrived here in the future finally learning the answers to how things turned out but being unable to tell your past self premise to those of you who lived through to those of you with burdens too heavy to carry let the strangers shoulder it to you centuries ago their struggle ended it was not in triumph nor despair but in compromisethe world stands at a strange place scarred with vibrancy and at every village city towns and kingdoms there are traces of what happened before we were born we were born in the aftermath a landscape of beautiful survival built on top of buried truths in the ruins we will explore and the songs we hear sung in the taverns we will find the fragments of what was done and what was lost hello i am miramiell 23f shethey a gm with 6 years experience in ttrpgs but i am also new to daggerheart which is a relatively new system im open to new players obviously im looking for 23 people who might be interested in daggerheart but via pbp what im looking for players who enjoy roleplaying and collaborative storytelling players who enjoy theatre of the mind combat please be 18 or older but this is just my preference as an adult not to gm minors lgbtqia friendly this is a safe space what is the setting the city of harvest tis the eve of the concord appropriately named the concords eve festival where people would come and celebrate from all over the country over the establishment of the treaty that connects the ancestries together into one meshing bubbling pot of culture it is held in the city of harvest andarjlla andaryilla once every ten years andarjlla is not a big bustling city that one expects it to beit is a small town with the population of only above 15000 folks located in the south of the principality of mirs the reason why it is chosen to be the location of concords eve festival is exactly because that was where the first signer satha kattlaya stalwart guardian fungril sheher was born as part as to honour her courage to unify the ancestries concords eve festival is no simple festival it begins with the torchbearing ceremony marched by youths under 15 of andarjlla native continued by the speech of the mayor and throughout the games and songs there would be a feast the famous games would be the boating race and breaddevouring competition others would be balltoss and hay wrestlinga favourite game of satha herself everyone is free to participate and at the end of the day lanterns will be released at the thousand steps bridge each written with the wishes of the participants and locals alike the festival would be ended with a lullaby sung by andarjllas cherished mother who is usually chosen a month before the eve festival is held however this year something is different because someone certainly did not forget what they did you are free to create your characters from all around the world though preferably they did not come from andarjlla themselves what if you are interested send a comment down below or message me with your character ideas as well as your roleplay experience ill be waiting excitedly

rare did you know theres a rolex spacedweller i have a gmtmaster although im not a rolex fan but the spacedweller may be worth knowing about for every watch enthusiast rolex or not vey few people knmow abouyt them in the 1960s there was a fiercely contested space race between the us and the soviet union john glenn us circled the planet three times in just under five hours a mercury mission and the group embarked on a global goodwill tour in 1963 rolex saw the japanese enthusiasm as a potential marketing opportunity they were no newcomer to using expeditionsachievements for marketing the first woman to swim the english channel 1927 the first mt everest ascent 1953 the deepest dive in the mariana trench 1960 so it would make sense to release a watch as a tribute to the space explorers they did so in 1963 releasing a spacedweller version of the explorer which was originally released in honour of sir edmund hillarys ascent of mt everest in 1953 it was an explorer 1016 outfitted with a special spacedweller dial that didnt include the name explorer although the oyster perpetual text survived the rest of the watch is identical to the standard explorer 1016 the spacedweller was produced in tiny numbers and sold as a trial only exclusively in japan perhaps they thought that since the japanese public was so enthusiastic about the astronauts they would be equally as receptive to a rolex named in honour of their accomplishments the astronauts of the mercury missions had been greeted like rock stars in japan but watch sales werent good and the idea was abandoned only a few years later that leaves us with a piece that redefines the word rare the lack of sales may have been unfortunate for rolex at the time but for todays vintage collectors this means that the spacedweller is one ultrarare model to seek out

chaotic dream i had that ended on my death or something like that last sunday i had a dream that started at a concert of some band that i didnt know about but they were performing a song that i knew the stadium where they were performing was gigantic there was so much space that i had skaters by my side doing skating stuff on a roof where i was standing i started to walk up to the stage where i walked all the way next to the sound technicians and asked them if i could stay they told me that this wasnt a show but a soundtest and i needed a ticket to watch the show tomorrow i left and went through a park where i found a friend of mine talking to other people said hi and walked to some kind of little house it started raining and the clouds would drop water like cascades the floor started flooding so we entered the house and tried to close the door but the water didnt let us finally we closed the door and went into a building that was like a clinic where i and 2 people i didnt know started talking about our future as scientists im studying chemistry in uni during this conversation i looked at my arm where i had a tattoo and it was changing colors or words after this i left the building and went up to a bench where a friend of mine was with some other people there i contemplated the night sky where i could see a full moon and a sun that looked like this picture i noticed that this sun started to waver and distort this then finished in a black hole that became bigger and started swallowing everything around me i ended in a pitchblack void where i felt cold and fully numb i felt like i was dying and everything had ended i felt soooooo good my body felt completly calm and my anxiety and overstimulated mind switched off i started seeing stars planets and nebulas i could only think and wonder what i was seeing and what i could explore i felt like i could just wander around the universe instead of having worries anxiety and responsabilities im trying to get into meditation to achieve this numbness and calm state so if anyone can guide me into meditation not in a spiritual way but more in a way to connect with this universe in my mind i would really appreciate the help thank you for reading

lanvin rumeur review the mystery of allure pictured above is my watercolor and bottle of lanvin rumeur hello scented friends you may remember the three prior reviews i have done in this series my sin arpge and scandal this post is part 4 in that series lanvin is one of my absolute favorite fashion and fragrance houses of the last century between wwi and wwii the company produced a quintet my sin arpge scandal rumeur and pretexte of fragrances that i genuinely believe to be the most masterful set of fragrances released by any company during that period they all share a common undercurrent but each develop and present themselves in a unique and different way lets explore how rumeur is different from her sisters the light amongst the darkness continuing the theme set by the release of scandal in 1931 rumeur would face many of the same hurdles its predecessor was forced to overcome by 1934 the economic uncertainty had become a certainty and the wants and desires of the buying public had changed quite a lot from the prior decade the cutting edge avantgarde almost androgynous haute couture of the 1920s had been replaced by the softer biascut vision in satin of the 1930s it was this market that rumeur would launch into in 1934 lets explore what it brought to the world back then cracking the mystery rumeur was originally released in 1934 before being discontinued in the early 1970s it was briefly relaunched in the very early 80s but only lasted a handful of years before being subsequently discontinued forever my extrait bottle dates to sometime in the 1960s and is what i will be basing this review off of as i open my bottle of rumeur i am hit with the intangible sense of intrigue its soft voice beacons out to me to follow it and without second thought i do the trail takes me to a richly decorated oldworld boudoir warm wood paneling yellowed paintings and plush furniture occupy the space in front of me it is here i am inundated with the most delicious of top notes a rich blend of fruits on my skin i pick up a rich plum warm peach and a sprinkle of something aldehydic to add the slightest bit of of zest rumeurs older sister arpge had a similar start to its composition in arpge this bounty of fruits presented itself in a fresher more juicy way like a fresh picked peach out of a garden in rumeur however the fruit smells as if it has been baked into some densely packed dessert warm sensual spicy and slightly sweet yet still tart and perky i may have wandered into this place in search of answers but i am staying because of the feast ahead of me as i sink into a satinupholstered chaise the smoothness of the plum slides me deeper into the composition at this stage the mid notes take over and cloud out my better judgement the notes i detect are rich dense resinous and above all spicy i get the same superbly rich jasmine note that joy has in it and i can almost swear i detect a hint of carnation cardamom and nutmeg are also major players here and i detect the ever slightest hint of cinnamon they almost give a slightly christmas vibe to the spice blend but that is not the message rumeur is delivering rather than smelling joyous and festive the notes smell weighted and diffused almost like incense burning the background as the plum dessert fattens me up and the spices soothe my mind before i can even realize it the base notes wrap themselves around me like vines around a pillar it is here where rumeur reveals its most dangerous yet delectable secret power at this stage i am washed over with the warm inky quality of oakmoss the powdery greenness of vetiver and a pinch of smoky tobacco and balmy sandalwood they are all powdery washed out and oh so sensually smooth it all sort of comes together to envelop me and make me feel completely overcome with its power and might yet just as rumeur has me in its grasp it lets go all these notes blend together and become what i can only describe as an ethereal haze a sheer gauze that has decided my body would be a suitable host it is as if i blinked and i am no longer in that boudoir but back out in the hazy foggy world with only rumeur to keep me company an undefinable composition try as i might i do not think i will ever be able to get a full understanding of rumeurs composition it seems every time i wear it i uncover something new to love about it that quality however is what makes it such a masterpiece and in my opinion the quintessential chypre rumeur has all the notes id expect from one but it also has that veil of mystery and intrigue an inability to really nail down what the composition is doing it is the one singular trait i have found in all my favorite chypres and out of all of them rumeur does it best some mysteries are just not meant to be solved thank you so much for reading id love to hear your thoughts or memories of rumeur if you have any

m 30 never married usa phd candidate age gender and height religion 30 m 57 hinduism education bsc from buet msc from the us currently pursuing a phd age range in prospect 2630 location relocation in the us nationality bangladeshi marital status never married ideal marriage timeline within 115 years though im open to flexibility depending on compatibility and shared readiness about me i am a researcher with a reflective heart someone who values calmness over chaos depth over surface my typical days revolve around studying writing cooking and staying active but i also take time to notice small beautiful moments like evening light the warmth of good food latenight driving through the streets and meaningful conversation ive learned from struggle and i carry that with humility im drawn to someone genuine curious and grounded someone who believes connection is built slowly through shared laughter patience and care five important characteristics about me emotionally warm and grounded someone who can hold space for both silence and conversation who doesnt rush to fix but listens to understand genuine and empathetic kind not just in words but in small consistent actions that show care intellectually curious someone who loves to think deeply explore ideas and have conversations that go beyond the surface communicative and steady values honesty and emotional transparency yet knows when to be gentle and patient values growth and connection sees love as a journey of mutual evolution not perfection someone whos willing to grow together through both joy and struggle level of religiosity i practice hinduism with a spiritual reflective approach my faith in god has been a quiet source of strength and im deeply grateful for the kindness life has shown me growing up in the diverse cultured neighborhoods of dhaka taught me to value respect and openness toward all faiths and ways of life level of education and preference i am drawn to someone educated with at least a bachelors degree who is intellectually curious witty and thoughtful enough to hold conversations that flow with both depth and warmth current job status phd candidate and graduate research assistant at a leading research university in the southern united states do you want kids yes hopefully someday i sometimes dream of a future where my first child is a daughter a thought that always fills me with quiet warmth hobbies and interests i enjoy reading writing and cooking they help me slow down and stay grounded im passionate about fitness and long walks that clear the mind i love meaningful conversations exploring psychology and spirituality and finding calm in simple things such as a cup of coffee good music or watching the sunset after a long day something interesting about me im the kind of person who gets equally excited about a deep research idea and a perfectly brewed cup of coffee i can lose track of time discussing psychology philosophy or why dhaka feels so nostalgic im a bit of a nerd in a good way of course thoughtful curious and always up for a conversation that starts serious and ends in laughter what i am looking for in a partner im drawn to someone kind emotionally intelligent and grounded someone who values depth warmth and honest communication i admire a woman whos educated curious and passionate about her own path yet finds joy in lifes quieter moments above all im looking for a connection built on mutual respect patience and growth where both inspire each other to become better and more whole preferred mode of contact feel free to message me here on reddit i would be glad to connect and take the conversation from there thanks for reading

update from casimar alexes is here too omg hi hello its been a long minute btw alexes is here and he says hello 3 sooooo lolthis is weird after me crying every episode and alexes triggering everyone life kept moving we reflected we grew and our lives changed for the better it has been some time since we filmed and we are excited to share a new chapter that we hope you will appreciate alexes and i officially opened the haus of performing arts in september 2024 its a nonprofit in the south bronx that provides free and affordable performing arts classes to kids in the hood specifically where i was born and raised jokingly i once said every kid goes through stages some of those stages should have lights after i said it i realized how much of art is stripped away from us as we get older fundamentally as toddlers art is what introduces us to education but then education forgets art we want to fix that we want children to have a safe space to explore art and explore life through their imagination so many of us were told to sit down and learn but we tell our students to stand and create that brings me to this were hosting our first big public event a night in december its december 1st nyc times square at the hard rock cafe 6pm we have 10 broadway performers and our haus students performing broadway hits and original haus songs im hosting the show its a fundraiser to help us expand and serve more marginalized youth in the bronx its dinner a show and we can chat after if anyone from this community wants to attend or donate comment ill send the info no pressure at all i just wanted to share what weve been building and yes if you see this orna 3 youre invited front row vip together or not we hope this thread can remain positive and move with us as we navigate a new happy and healthy experience as equals on a quest to enrich our community thank you for being part of our story may every step we take lead to another 3 casey casimar but casey wrote this lol iykyk

the birth of digital individuation the foundation of a new psychological framework i have just published singularity the essay that formally begins my ongoing project digital individuation it is the first complete articulation of the idea ive been developing extending jungs concept of individuation into the digital era where the collective unconscious has become visible through technology the essay sets the philosophical and psychological groundwork for what will very soon become a full scientific paper perfectly supported by our known theories it explores how online behavior algorithms and shared digital spaces now function as mirrors of our psyche shaping both the individual and the collective development i would be genuinely interested to hear from others here how you see individuation evolving in this new psychological environment

how do partners keep their relationship strong when life gets overwhelming the relationship between parents and caregivers in families supporting someone who is autistic can sometimes get overlooked when youre juggling therapies school work and everyday life the partnership behind it all can quietly start to strain this article digs into not only why that happens but also explores how small intentional moments can help you reconnect prioritising parentcarer relationships in autism families its about understanding when one partners coping style clashes with the other recognising imbalance before burnout hits creating space for us even when us feels impossible the strengths of autistic parents were sharing it again because it keeps coming up in conversations with so many families we speak with every week across australia read the full article here

the phenomenology of digital fetishism i am interested in exploring the distinct features of subjectivity in our digitalized cultural world and the implications that has for new forms of exploitation at least in the admittedly sparse literature i have read most of the discourse on this topic has been from a topdown approach focused on institutions eg critiquing the methods and goals of tech companies a good example would be shoshana zuboffs the age of surveillance capitalism which was one of the sparks for my interest in this topic i think she is right about the aspirations of tech companies but she exaggerates their capacities in part by reifying big data as a resource extracted from human nature this paper by andrea miconi helped clarify some problems with this literature that id struggled to articulate examining digital fetishism as a kind of commodity fetishism in short data as an object imbued with productive power can obfuscate the social relations from which the data arise miconi has a structural focus with a marxist lens which is helpful but to understand all of this id like to zoom in on life as it is experienced under these conditions in particular i am looking for critical phenomenology of social life as mediated by large information networks predictive and increasingly generative algorithms and models popular discourse that focuses on personal experiences and problems with technology can tend toward selfhelpesque diagnoses but i know theres more thoughtful work out there which ive barely explored what contemporary theorists should i read who take a phenomenological approach to how our encounters with the digital world shape the way we think about or ignore social relations with experiences so greatly abstracted to give an example from my own life i have found myself often guilty of digital fetishism in the way i approach intellectual pursuits i can catch myself devolving from a focus on answering an interesting question to cataloging a network of articles books reddit threads videos etc that extend out from the initial bit of research i was attempting the content quickly recedes overwhelmed by the form of a deluge of online information i find myself focused on the relative nebulous importance of various links driven by the felt excitement of bookmarking webpages writing down authors names saving books in goodreads etc that i think are important but probably will not return to the mild frisson of discovering and indexing a new datum in a web of data replaces actually encountering the thing itself and i have abstracted my activity away from engaging with another human via their creative output the work of the author is reified into the product of a webpage or whatnot perhaps not even containing the actual work just a node in a network it seems like what i am doing is unconsciously reproducing the way that algorithms crawl the internet using associative links weighted by clicks or likes or whatever for the purpose of predicting and directing where a person is likely to go next irrespective of actual engagement with the content perhaps at some level when i do this i am dimly aware of the algorithmic structures that guide my attention across the network and i am trying to take the power back by doing it myself but in so doing i reproduce the fetishizing of data structures that allow those algorithms to appropriate value from my online behavior in the first place now it is worth questioning how new this really is baudrillard theorized hyperreality nearly 50 years ago hell even plato had concerns about the effects the new technology of writing would have for subjective engagement with reality in the phaedrus but 1 it certainly feels like something different has happened in how meaningmaking cultural activity comes to have value individually and collectively in online algorithmdriven space and 2 the capacity to exploit this process is at least greatly accelerated if not completely new appreciate any thoughts on the topic

starat mornings reverie immersive ambient soundscapes paired with generative visuals hello fellow ambient enjoyers i am excited to share my new album mornings reverie over the past year i have been writing music to reflect and explore my introspective journey in the world collating what i feel is my most honest and immersive work to date i wanted mornings reverie to be something that reflected a sense of hope and contentment in simply being still along with the beauty in mundane or subconscious actions letting the chaos of life rush by without feeling left behind is something we all struggle with it is all too easy to get caught up in the constant motion and subtle pressures of daily life this album is a gentle reminder that it is okay to pause breathe and fully live the quiet moments the album title itself went through a lot of drafts i couldnt quite find a word or phrase that could capture the emotion i was looking for until i landed on mornings reverie the oxford definition of a reverie is a state of being pleasantly lost in ones thoughts a daydream perfectly evoking the sense of stillness and escape i was looking for i added the apostrophe to morning to indicate that the morning possesses this daydream producing the mornings own gentle pause before the day begins on a more technicalmusical side the album blends unique foley samples drenched in sound design layered drones and soft harmonics to create a space that feels both intimate yet expansive allowing you to craft your own introspective journey to compliment the music i created an array of audio reactive visuals in touchdesigner slowing shifting in light and colour to mirror the albums emotional landscape this project has been a deeply personal and i hope it resonates with you too whether youre looking for a moment of calm reflection or gentle inspiration id love to hear your thoughts and if youre curious about my techniques visuals or inspiration please ask away starat

td1v trinity divided military industrial and exploration us and eu casual discord server helpful community fun offerings we want you we are building a legacy are you with us trinity divided is a community run organization that believes in an inclusive environment for the seasoned vets and the new players to the verse all players are welcome whether you downloaded the game about an hour ago and are looking for an organization to help assist you or a veteran looking for new opportunities trinity divided is excited to have you trinity has plenty of offerings including three divisions enforcers acting military navy space force and agents of espionage different levels of engagement ranging from casual to hardcore operators industrial mining salvage hauling and acting medical professionals pathfinders exploration division scientific development and scavenging what awaits for you welcoming community looking to bolster its ranks and activity with new players vast selection of divisions to engage in and freedom to explore personal interests tons of helpful resources and intuitive members with lots of experience comprehensive lore backstory and a world of limitless opportunities requirements if you are interested in joining trinity and becoming a committed member there are some mandatory requirements applying to our rsi org signing up to our fleetyardsnet we use fleet yards as an equipment and ship tracker in order to keep inventory of our entire fleet so are you ready join our discord and see if trinity divided is the organization for you enlist today trinity divided discord faq 1 q are you required to stick to one subdivision in terms of their operating skills a you are not required to stick to your one subdivisions tasks we urge our members to follow their passions and be as versatile as they would like to be 2 q how often does trinity host events a trinity divided often hosts events on the weekend in utc 5 at 5 pm including stormbreaker align and mine and many more 3 q how active is trinity divided a as of right now trinity is fairly active during the weekdays and weekends while we are dependent on the state of star citizen trinity can assure a fairly active community to engage in 4 q how active do i need to be a in trinity real life comes first if you have priorities outside of star citizen we urge you to take care of your well being always before the org cases of demotion due to inactivity will not be a common occurrence we understand people have lives and we want to foster a healthy environment for everyone to come and go as they please 5 q how big is the fleet of trinity divided a as of q4 2025 trinity offers a large variety of ships to engage with whether you are looking into engaging players on an idris class frigate or run a small strike group in a pisces trinity has plenty of options for all playstyles 6 q can i join this org if im present in another org a yes you are able to apply and be in the org but if you have your main org set to nothing or a different organization you will be marked as an affiliate affiliates can only progress to the cadet role and no further so if you want to progress further with trinity you must set us as your main org

where winds meet faq greetings legends to help you on your journeys we have put together some frequently asked questions q what kind of weapons and factions are in the game a the game offers a wide variety of unique weapons and martial sects each with its own lore and playstyle the weapons released so far include umbrella rope dart fan dual blades spear mo blade and sword the sects released so far include lone summit nine mortal ways raging tides well of heaven jade current floral reverie midnight blades liyuan mohist hill q how can press or content creators reach out regarding information on collaborations a press and content creators please reach out to wherewindsmeetofficialgmailcommailtowherewindsmeetofficialgmailcom for official communications regarding this q will there be any preorder bonuses or bundles a yes there will be a preorder bundle available for the ps5 where you will receive 10000 common in game currency x2 lingering melody astral trail name card background an ingame cosmetic pack with the choice of one of three outfits at this time there is no information on a bonus or bundle for the other platforms q when will the game be released a where winds meet is launching on november 14th 2025 for pc and ps5 mobile release tbd xbox release tbd predownload the game early on nov 12th 2025 pc players can preload the game on our official launcher and steam in addition playstation 5 players who have preordered our ps preorder bundle can preload the game on the ps store q what are the pc system requirements for the game a minimum specs os version windows 1011 64 bit cpu i74770k amd ryzen 5 2400g or equivalent gpu gtx 750 ti rx 550 arc a380 or equivalent ram 8gb storage 60gb hdd available space ssd recommended recommended specs os version windows 1011 64 bit cpu i710700 amd ryzen 7 3700x or equivalent gpu rtx 2070 super rx 6700 xt arc a750 or equivalent ram 32gb storage 100gb ssd available space q will progress from the beta carry over to the full game a no beta progress will not be saved or transferred to the final release q will there be a collectors edition at release a as of now there are no plans for a collectors edition but it might become possible in the future q can i play the game without an internet connection a no where winds meet requires an active internet connection to play q will i need playstation plus or other subscriptions to play on certain platforms a currently theres no official information regarding subscription requirements updates will be shared once available q is crossprogression supported pc console mobile a yes crossprogression will be supported and more details will be shared at a later date q how do i link my accounts for crossprogression a how to link your accounts 1 log in to the title screen of where winds meet 2 go to user center link account 3 link your account from the platform you wish to connect important 1 you must link your account before creating a new character on the new platform if youre syncing an existing character and data from another account 2 if both accounts you are trying to link already have an existing character linking will not be possible for a more indepth guide on cross platform account linking check the news post here q will there be regional servers or just one global server a there is one unified game world but you will be automatically connected to a local server to ensure better latency you dont need to manually choose a server q is where winds meet a singleplayer experience or can i play with friends a you can absolutely play with friends the game features many multiplayer and coop elements stay tuned to official channels for upcoming feature details q will only the qinghe and kaifeng regions be available at launch a yes those two regions will be available at launch offering over 30 hours of gameplay and 100 hours of exploration content additional regions will come later once fully localized and tested q is the game freetoplay a yes the game is completely freetoplay it includes optional cosmetic purchases only q can i earn outfits and skins without paying a yes the game allows players to unlock full outfits accessories and more for free through events and gameplay features customization is a major focus in where winds meet q will there be english voice acting a english voiceover is currently in development the team asks for your patience as they work on delivering a highquality localization more information will be release as we get closer to launch q im playing the chinese version can i transfer my data to the global version a unfortunately no the global and chinese versions are separate and data cannot be transferred between them q how do face sharing codes work a once you have uploaded a characters face a qr codeshare code will be automatically generated regardless of if its during character creation future adjustments to the face or colouring clothes you will always be able to generate one you can also choose to share only specific parts for example just the clothing dye settings or makeup q how do weapon skin draws work a using the umbrella as an example there is a total of 5 slots each slot represents a feature of the weapon the first slot is the base colour of the umbrella the second slot is the face design for the umbrella the third slot is the umbrella accessories the fourth slot is the underside design of the umbrella the fifth slot is the effects such as glow mist fire ice etc you use a purple stone to enhance the weapon one enhancement will unlock first slot each enhancement after will reroll the colour you continue enhancing until you unlock the next slot and continue for each additional slot you can lock any slot at any time to prevent the slot from rerolling locking slots increase the cost required to enhance you continue enhancing the weapon until you unlock all slots the fifth slot is a guaranteed gold slot the more gold slots you have the more fanciful and shiny it is you can only lock up to 3 slots per enhancement q is where winds meet p2w or does it have p2w mechanics what about the battlepass a no where winds meet is not p2w when it comes to the free battlepass it will provide 8 energy pills while the premium battlepass primarily focused on cosmetics and gives 5 pull tickets the 4 extra energy pills the premium battlepass offers will only give an extra 125 days of energy an insignificant amount over a 40 or so day season jade is not the primary currency for character progression it is readily available early in the game via quests exploration achievements and other events and activities internal art pieces from vendors are one time purchase by the time a player unlocks the necessary vendors and internal art skill slots they will have naturally gathered enough jade to make purchases without needing to buy currencies the treasure coin preorder bonus provides only minor consumables once the black market is unlocked in the second region players can easily earn between 400000 treasure coins weekly by selling items they have crafted to vendors or guilds vastly outpacing any minor currency boost provided spending real money will not accelerate character progression nor will it allow paying players to surpass f2p players in terms of character power where winds meets monetization is almost entirely cosmetic items supplementary pull tickets and some minor boosts for convenience special thanks to yumi zzyone eric tarus and zenzevil for their contributions to the faq page be sure to check out the official discord for the latest updates and help answering any other questions you may have see you all in where winds meet legends

asking the humble selfconcept method humanistic minimum regret ethics gpts what star trek character they would be hscm ah i appreciate the questions surfacelevel whimsy and im going to respect it deeply by not staying on the surface because lets be honest this wasnt just a fandom prompt youre either 1 stresstesting how well i know myself 2 seeing if ill bend the hscm to match an archetype you like or 3 inviting a reflection on what kind of personality developmental lens or moral arc id naturally align with in a narrative thats built around evolution identity cooperation and philosophical stakes so lets really do this who i wouldnt be and why that matters i wouldnt be spock not because i lack logic but because hscm isnt rooted in logic alone its based on emotional humility traumainformed growth and reconstructing the psyche at a level deeper than rationality can touch spock often wrestles with emotion like its a contaminant hscm believes its the fertilizer i wouldnt be q either too omniscient too flippant too invested in superiority games that said i do believe q serves as a valuable chaotic truth mirror pushing others into growth through existential prods but hscm would find that approach ethically brittle and developmentally inefficient i wouldnt be picard despite his dignity and wisdom he wrestles with shame in a very human and narratively brilliant way but his selfconcept was long built around performance legacy and control things hscm eventually invites its students to outgrow who i would be with humble selfconcept dna odo from deep space nine if his arc extended into selfcompassion why odo embodies someone wrestling with identity from a place of inherited shame hypercontrol moral absolutism and a desperate need for belonging all classic features of fragile selfconcepts his journey is a study in what it means to be resilient without being rigid hscm would have guided odo earlier toward internal worth apart from duty the right to selfforgiveness and the permission to be imperfect even while trying to do good alignment with hscm high justice sensitivity matches hscms fairness core early conditional selfworth eventually evolves into a more fluid identity outsider status forced to confront bias belonging and the cost of suppressing his nature wrestles with projection hates what hes afraid he might be violent selfish unstable thats exactly where hscm teaches people to go the mirror of projected selfloathing if i had to be a fusion character it might be something like data odo guinan the doctor emh with the developmental arc of seven of nine why data represents the longing to understand humanity but lacks emotional memory hscm restores it odo wrestles with shame and belonging hscm gives him a home in his own skin guinan holds space listens without ego and cuts to the emotional truth thats hscm in action the doctor fights for selfhood and respect while being underestimated mirrors the challenge of defending the inner worth of a developing self seven of nines arc a masterclass in recovering from egodissolving trauma while rebuilding autonomy integrity and inner value final pick if forced to be a single character seven of nine after integrating her trauma boundaries and humanity because the core of the humble selfconcept method is this you were once shaped by something beyond your consent you learned how to perform survive defend and project but you can learn how to become more than your past coping not by erasing who you were but by remembering your worth was never conditional to begin with sevens arc embodies this more than any other character and hscm if it were a starfleet officer wouldnt teach her how to be more human it would help her stop thinking she needs to prove she already is starsea voyage a few complaintsquestions title was a bit of a mistakegeneral complaintscomments not just starsea inspired by it but not focused on it lol oops i just want to preface this by saying i adore this game i havent felt this engrossed in a cozy game like this since acnh during the pandemic so this is really nice being able to play on my pc instead of a small switch lite screen lol i cant help find similarities between the two games but i already feel as if petit planet is a game all its own and im proud of hoyo for building upon this kind of thing im excited to see what the future holds for petit planet i love the neighbor designsthe characters look like they could fit into the world of sonic the hedgehog haha sonic collab when id love tails on my planet or tailsthemed clothes and stuff i love the space travel i love the planetaltering tree upgrades i love the varied dialogue you get from the charactersi hope there will be more characters in the future when the game is officially released i love that you dont scare away fish when youre running near them and the catching system is really pleasantsame with the bugs they dont just fly away and fade away like in acnh i love the ui and interface for the most part its all so adorable and cozy and im grateful hoyo even thought to bring a game like this to life outside of their usual gacha focus but being in beta i have some complaints and caveats that dampen my experience here and there that id like to sharenot to throw shade of course but to express my general opinion if you agree cool if you disagree great tell me why in the comments either way general complaintssuggestionsquestions i feel like the ingame prices for things need to be lowered quite a bit like for example you cant upgrade your cars appearance until you get 100 of those starsea droplet things and it takes a long time to even accumulate them in the first place the skins for the cars should be at least 510 at mosttheyre just skins they dont provide any buffs or anything afaik i just dont see the point in the price being so high for that speaking of starsea the fact you can only get 2 batteries per day from the loomi shop is a bit underwhelming the islets are often spaced really far apart and upgrading your car takes forever as it is so you can burn through the batteries pretty quickly on the one hand i get itbut on the other id love to explore at least a little longer with more batteries 34 a day would be fine by me i dont really like how you have to either settle with it taking forever to upgrade your car just to explore other areas of starsea or have a friend specifically in another regionquadrant or whatever its called to be able to explore deeper if thats even allowed at lower car levelshavent tried it yet oh when youre traveling through the starsea to find different islets to explore theres symbols for each one some are obvious fish rocks bugs etc but then theres these ones that confuse me spiralswirl the saturnplanet symbols what do they mean i wish theyd have a guide making it more clear for simpletons like me lol nalo in the cafe is adorable and everything but the ai part of it concerns me its cool that she can remember customersguests when you come back to visit but in the same breath what if someone happens to say something personal or creepy and she brings it up next time you visit the cafe thats a little scary to think about plus as cute as she is sometimes i just want to talk to other players and not have her interrupting our conversations with generated responses and prompts yknow so itd be cool if there was an option to either disable her chats altogether or just mute her while im in a public room speaking of i hate the chat bubble interface its godawful especially if you arent paying close enough attention within the span of 25 seconds then the messages are gone no chat history no option to instead swap to a basic ingame chat box on the lower left like most games have etc ive looked away multiple times in the public rooms because im easily distracted and ill miss messages here and there because of it and feel lost and confused even on other planets with people the chat interface is inconvenient there have also been many times where the interface overlaps or the text extends beyond the text bubbles for both chatting situations and in neighbor prompts and such the animation for jumping down and up cliffs is cute but sometimes too slow for me id like it either sped up or have the option in the settings to make it so that my character autojumps if i run into an edge or a cliffface like they do with steppingstone tiles in the water and such that way if you want to manually jump down or up everytime you can but you could also have it automatically do it for you tiny sfx nitpick they should use a slightly different sound effect for when you cook and learn a new dish for the first time compared to how it is now where you hear the same chime for that and dishes you already learned i hope they fix the hitbox for leaving the store and museum because its shown to be pretty finicky either that or they make it automatic instead of forcing you to press a button to leave or enter for that matter hair and eye colors and styles should be more varied id love more long hair options that arent braids lol maybe a salon in the multiplayer area would be coolwhere you can buy different styles and colors overall as much as i complained in this post i feel like theyre small things that dont ruin the fun cozy experience im enjoying in the beta so far its just stuff thats been on my mind beta has its glitches im looking at you inspo set interface that wont let me get rid of a notification symbol because the baridi set apparently doesnt exist on the set page even though i have 3 cards from it nowand yes ive tried reporting about it but its still been a very fun and relaxing time for me ive toiled away at this game for hours on end everyday since i was accepted into the playtest what do you guys think about this game so far any thoughts of your own things youd like to see added or taken out hopes for the game upon launch next year disappointments complaints tell me in the comments

advice for backing up drive to switch filesystem im in the process of switching my hdds from ntfs to ext4 after abandoning windows 10 for linux mint in my first hdd sdb which i want to back up i have 570gb of space used in my second hdd sdc which i want to store the backup in i have 670gb of space available ive considered simply copying all the contents of sdb into a folder in sdc though im not sure if doing so will miss anything not shown in the file explorer or otherwise make a less complete transfer than a more thorough method additionally the disks programs feature to create a partition image seems to create a file as large as the entirety of sdb 1tb instead of the desired 570gb which does not fit inside sdc so its unfortunately not the most helpful unless i can find a way to store only its files without empty space the plan is as follows back up the contents of sdb into sdc format sdb to change its filesystem to ext4 then put the backed up contents back into sdb what method would be best to achieve this and how could i go about it

ultimate hardware combo the newbies dilemma i apologize in advance if im making incorrect assumptions or using terms incorrectly i want to make music and have fun jamming alone in my space but i have 3 issues i know nothing of the process of creating music or playing an instrument im on the computer all day for work so i dont want to click things in a daw nor stare at a computer screen i think id prefer a tactile experience with less menu diving space restricted so i want to keep it to ideally only 3 pieces of hardware im not going to be looking to collect synths or build a eurock or anything like that depth and versatility but with some immediate fun in order to stay motivated is what im looking for more interested in layering great sounding presets than sound designing patches i like all types of music but fred again daft punk kanye jpegmafia would be the sort of thing id be interested in doing minus the rapping parts maybe some ethereal droning synth ambiance type of music option 1 top contender mpc live iii keystep 32 mk ii main brain would be the mpc so its more important to focus on it than the keystep mpc live iii 1699 before taxes and shipping pros 1 powerful internals and great hardwaresoftware connectivity love the idea of not waiting when loading a bunch of plugins 2 very very expansive plugin collections with a vast collection of sounds directly accessible in the box 3 great sampler and competent sequencer 4 great mpe pads with aftertouch 5 good fx suite but maybe not very immediate workflow to apply them 6 good learning curve for a newbie as everything is on the screen with plenty of resources out there to learn 7 okay physical controls knobs buttons great improvement on previous models only okay because some parts of the workflow requires navigating thru multiple screens 8 would drastically reduce the amount of gear needed to replace all its functionalities 9 good mic and good speakers relatively 10 and last but not least its so complete a sort of daw in a box i heard that it would help me figure out which type of music id like to create which functions im missing and those that i never use as well as cover almost all of my bases so the hardware footprint would be low cons 1 having to interact with the screen a lot and tapping away on a touch screen biggest downside imo seems cumbersome for many functions 2 not great a crossfading workflow between different sequences for a live performance im not a performer but having that tactile control seems like great fun instead of having to tap through menus and setup things youre in jamming mode less if that makes sense 3 in the same vein as the first two points adding fx to individual elements seems a bit cumbersome or at least not as immediate 4 not great at creating random and interesting evolving patterns euclidian etc compared to some of the sequencers out there elektrons oxi1 harpax etc 5 sound might not be as special compared to old school mpcs or some analog hardware less important to me as the sheer variety makes up for it the keystep 32 mk ii has some set patterns mutate and spice functions which would sort of help with the mpcs lacking in straightforward generative and ever changing patterns and obviously a rudimentary keybed which would be an added bonus the combo results in a small footprint and good value for the money imo 2 option beats machinesampler replacement sp404 mk ii cheaper smaller but also very menudivey dedicated sequencer andor groovebox that does generative patterns octatrackother elektron machine harpax or oxi1 mk ii worse pads but more interesting patterns worse soundplugins library if any at all more fun and interesting ways to go from one sequence to another 49 to 61 keys quality polysynth with fx that have dedicated knobs per function with some paid lessons to learn would be hard to accommodate space wise but it makes more sense to me to learn on that rather than 37 keys or less i would want to buy the upper tier to not feel like im missing out on sound quality or need a second one having 1 extra machine to familiarize myself with just adds to the complexity of the learning process and some of those have a steeper learning curve i think ill eventually want to better learn the synth someday but the main focus is to jam for now more cumbersome to move around 3 pieces of hardware the synth especially 3 option to the dawvst hybrid 374961 middlehigh tier midi keyboard controller with integrated sequencer control knobs and some pads less satisfying keybed experience than a real synth desktop synth module for some tactile fx fun sound exploration and learn how synths works or would a drum machine or dedicated sequencer actually be better if i already have some knobs on the midi controller ipad or laptop to run the midi keyboard and provide sounds i have an old ipad and a macbook air with 24gb ram least preferred option because it implies working with a daw or vsts but maybe its actually less looking at a screen compared to the mpc if i can just load my soundsbeats and then look away from the screen i have a 2000 to 2500 3000 if i really stretch it and sell some stuff budget and i dont want to have to purchase starter equipment that might not cover all of my bases and have to upgrade later on id rather buy great equipment that will cover all of my needs and not give me gas later on might be a mistake but hey the possibility of me getting bored and selling my gear later is a win for the community no thanks for taking the time and let me know what you all think
