honest review lamiche and ppeum clinic in seoul what i wish i knew just got back from visiting lamiche clinic in seoul and im reeling from the experiences wtf just happened before i get into the stories just want to explain that im no newbie to korean clinics ive spent two years researching clinics i watched every tiktok video i could find i scoured reddit and poured over the unni app last november i dipped my toe into korean clinics with a visit to ppeum in gangnam to get botox the genesis laser and ulthera and loved the experience i felt confident that i knew exactly what to expect was i in for a shock the week started off great with a visit to ppeum in myeongdong to get crows feet botox and discuss my plan for treatments the consultation was held with someone fluent in english and she gave me super informative feedback about how to plan my treatments for the week ppeum has regular monthly specials and everything is transparently priced in a binder with photos and descriptions of treatments we decided on botox i was welcomed to a back room to wash my face and get numbing cream and a few quick jabs later i was on my way back to the hotel the clinic looked lovely with plush couches a robot making me a latte and they even gave me free coins to try their claw machine i got excellent treatment and it cost me about 40 for the crows feet area i was raving to my best friend that i might prefer the nofrills factory style clinics for their efficiency and affordability im not the kind of girl who needs a private room and tea i just want a good consultation quality work and an affordable price then let me be on my way to explore korea my best friend and i saved our big treatment day at lamiche for the day before we left korea knowing we were going to look raggedy afterwards we were both invited to receive comped treatments worth up to 5000 as an influencer collaboration and i was delighted to finally try all the treatments i had been researching for years neither of us a really influencers but hey who says no to free treatments i knew i would probably make lots of content reviewing the process anyways so might as well i should have realized that the pricing wasnt going to be transparent when i emailed lamiche asking for their pricing and i got a pdf without any individual pricing only packages when we approached lamiche it was a huge business with signage on three different buildings we followed the elevator up to a waiting room that appeared quite dingy and dated and i told myself not to judge a clinic by how ugly the waiting room looks when we checked into the front desk we let the staff know that we doing a collab for lamiche the staff seemed stressed and asked us to sit down a staff member came to talk to us and spent quite a long time going over our medications meticulously which seems odd because spoiler alert they prescribed us medications that were contraindicated with what we were taking and could have been dangerous another staff member came to take us to another floor and the two staff members argued with each other in korean it was stressful to say the least we were hustled from one floor to another with the note taker staff lady trailing us and continuing to ask us medication questions how many months have you been on birth control are you sure finally we got our faces washed and photos taken of our faces the whole time being hustled from room to room by the time we were sat in front of the doctor in her dingy cluttered office with an english translator we were apprehensive about what to expect they flashed our photos on the screen and the doctor asked my best friend what she wanted improved elasticity she squeaked have you considered botox the translator said sure sounds good and that was the end of that conversation i pointed out things i wanted improved and let the doctor know what treatments i was getting at home like hydroquinone 2 topical for melasma and a regular series of microneedling for acne scars she nodded then to our total surprise we were hustled back out to the waiting room the total time with the doctor was under five minutes we both sat in the waiting room trying to understand what was going on while the note taker was still asking about our medications how do you spell spironolactone finally another staff member came to take us to the treatment area for the face numbing cream before we start we would like to talk to the doctor first about what treatments she suggests but you just talked to the doctor she didnt tell us what treatments we will receive the staff member beckoned another staff person over and they argued in korean in front of us then turned at us and said come to the treatment area and someone will tell you what treatments you will receive no i said we dont want any treatments until we can discuss them with the doctor why i was hoping to get sculptra or in mode fx today and i want to ask the doctor if im the right candidate for that no problem we will write that on a paper and ask the doctor for you my best friend looked at me with a panicked look in her eyes we politely argued with the staff back and forth and finally they said look we have a very busy day and the doctor isnt available you will have to wait a long time just come to the treatment area and someone will tell you what treatments youll be getting begrudgingly we were hustled to separate rooms before they separated us i grabbed my besties hand and told her once they tell you your treatment plan ask to speak to the doctor we were led to small dark rooms with wheeled beds all facing a curtained epicenter with multitudes of laser machines and clinical staff hurrying around i laid down on the bed with a questionable floral blanket and someone pulled open the curtain at the head of the bed applied numbing cream with a spatula wiped it off with a tissue and put it back on the wallmounted holder and disappeared as quickly as they appeared i happened to notice a tiny note taped to the wall among various medical paraphernalia and signage that said if you are experiencing pain you can request these options more numbing cream local anesthetic shots a muscle numbing shot or laughing gas i made a mental note to request the local anesthetic which ended up saving me a sales rep entered the room with a stapled paper this is the treatment the doctor recommends ultherapy sculptra in mode fx botox to lift the corners of your mouth and bbl laser i was beginning to realize that there was no pricing mentioned for any of these treatments and there wouldnt be a backandforth discussion of what could get me the best results for the 5000 value id like to discuss this with the doctor i said you already talked to the doctor but i didnt get to talk about treatments with the doctor i understand that sculptra can be applied to the upper or lower face i want to ask the doctor which is better for me no problem when someone comes to do your treatment they will decide on the best place for sculptra but for ultherapy i said im concerned that it can get rid of facial fat did they doctor say where to apply ultherapy no problem the person to apply your treatment will know the good place at this point i grew more firm and made it clear that i would not be getting any treatments until i spoke with a doctor about the treatment plan the translator seemed over dealing with me but a doctor popped out from behind the curtain within five minutes i recognized his face from the magazine covers in the waiting room and realized he was the head doctor at the clinic so who was i talking to in the consultation room was that original doctor getting any of the messages relayed through the translator i explained that id like to treat acne scars during my visit too i was wisening up to the fact that their pricing and packages are loosey goosey so i wanted that concern addressed even if it wasnt my 1 concern i had read some peerreviewed studies that showed subscision using a needle to scrape the adhesions under the scar combined with c02 laser improved acne scars more than any other treatments so i asked for co2 and subcision the doctor suggested a different laser and i asked why it was better than the combination of co2 and subcision instead of giving me an answer he agreed to co2 and subcision then i asked about sculptra and the doctor grabbed my hand put a mirror in it and wrapped his fingers over mine holding the mirror up to my face a bit aggressively i was startled by this but chalked it up to a cultural difference perhaps hes just in a rush and that works more efficiently than asking me to hold a mirror you have more more volume on one side of your face than the other he said and gosh darn he was 100 right no sculptra for you it will make your face too big better to shrink your face with ultherapy and thermage would it balance my face to put sculptra on the side without volume i asked the doctor shrugged ok is it possible to also get botox in my forehead i asked no you must pay for forehead botox not included i couldnt believe that botox which is so cheap in korea was the threshold of their package and not the co2 or sculptra but i was pushing my luck so i didnt mind it i thanked the doctor profusely for his time and he disappeared back behind the curtain i haggled with the translator to let me go find my bestie in her little room to help her with her treatment plan and when i found her she looked terrified she was holding the treatment plan paper while the sales rep talked at her and bestie looked like she was about to flee i reviewed her treatment plan and talked her through each one sculptra thermage bbl laser genesis laser and botox this is a fairly moderate approach not a lot of risks to be concerned about sculptra can cause some scar tissue formation just like any needle can when it pierces the skin which some say can be a concern if you want a face lift in the future other plastic surgeons say that a quality surgeon will know how to handle sculptra faces and it shouldnt be an issue she nodded nervously thermage will hurt but its over in ten minutes youre a tough girl you got this ask for the local anesthetic injection okay and when the doctors pop out of the curtain to do the treatments make sure you tell each one that you have work on monday so they need to go easy i went back to my room someone popped out of the curtain to inject my face with local anesthetic in 68 places which probably hurt the most you can feel it deep in the bone from there the next two hours were a dizzying blur of the curtain opening and closing and a rotating array of different doctors doing treatments me literally in the dark with a gauze taped over my eyes they started with thermage but i didnt even know what treatment they were doing and later i noticed in my recorded video that they applied it on my cheeks i really hope that it doesnt create fat loss in my cheeks something i would have wanted to go over with the doctor oh well the thermage ulthera and in mode fx was completely manageable with the local anesthetic shots it felt like a gentle warmth and light pinching about 10 of my face wasnt completely numb and i certainly felt the pain then comparable to a splinter or bee sting or burning my neck with a curling iron but the pain is very short and then theyre right back to the numb parts of my face i found that with deep breaths and tapping my fingerspinching my finger tips to distract my brain from the pain it was actually easy i asked each doctor with a translation app what treatment was next and it helped enormously to know what was causing the pain and remind myself in my head how the treatment works meanwhile in another room my bestie was having panic attacks as they went at her with unexplained treatments not knowing what was what and why it hurts at one point i asked to sneak away to her room for a few minutes and held her hands while they finished her treatments talking her through the anxiety she told me later that if i hadnt shown up she would have walked out midtreatment from the anxiety of it all next a young doctor approached me with a big needle this is the fat dissolving injection for your double chin i didnt recall seeing that on my treatment plan reread it later and sure enough it was there in the list but i thought to myself you know what hell yeah i could feel the acid burning for several hours but it was a warm soreness that was easy with the anesthetic the botox came after applied by the same head doctor i had thrown a polite fit to speak to he announced simply botox and squirted liquid through the needle the mist falling onto my face he jabbed my neck scalp corners of mouth forehead i guess he decided to throw forehead botox in after all and other points in my face that in all my 10 years of botox no other injector has ever injected each time misting my face with botox liquid that he squirted out before each jab i closed my eyes and wondered to myself if neurotoxin is safe for eyes i forgot to check the needle and see if it was unopenedreal botox but at this point i was in a haze the sculptra was last and it was painless with the anesthetic i swear i could hear the adhesions popping loose under my skin as the needle swirled around under my cheek then i was given verbal recovery instructions which i had the good sense to immediately write down in my phone before i forgot and was scooted out to the waiting room we were told to get our prescription on a different floor and again there was more stressful interactions with the staff trying to figure out where we were supposed to be all the staff seemed irritatedstressedconfused each time we spoke to them and we wondered if they havent fully streamlined their foreign process or if this is just a cultural difference in customer service for being a collab based on a review we were surprised to be treated like we were a surprise nuisance they gave my bestie an influencer gift but not me and we joked that it was because i argued too much they slapped a chin sling on us and we found ourselves holding a prescription at their preferred pharmacy across the street this is where things get really weird i was prescribed isotretinoin accutane oral transexamic acid keeps pigment from reforming hydroquinone cream fades melasma and tretinoin improves cellular turnovertexture the total cost was 120 for all the prescriptions back at our hotel i noticed the prescription note said not recommended to take transexamic acid trx while on birth control upon further googling i found out that oral trx mixed with birth control greatly increases the risk of blood clots so much so that its considered unethical to even test this on women considering we were also going on a 14 hour fight the next day that combo could have been seriously dangerous and even lifethreatening and nothing was said to me about this even after they had meticulously logged my medications also odd i had told them that im taking prescription hydroquinine cream for melasma that contains the topical form of trx and tretinoin all three medications that they double prescribed me and i paid 120 for at their pharmacy its obvious my medication history wasnt taken into account at all finally if anyone reading this has taken isotretinoin accutane you know that medication has a 30day waiting period a medical online quiz and two pregnancy tests before you can even get your hands on it along with continuous liver testing to make sure you arent one of the 15 who gets liver abnormalities its worth the effort because it causes absolute radiant skin forget pregnancy glow accutane glow is unmatched so why is lamiche prescribing both me and my bestie a 60 day course of accutane when we dont have any acne is it to create a quick glow and glass skin effects that will last as long as the accutane does that we attribute to the clinics treatments im truly puzzled even if drugs are controlled differently in korea where was our medication consultation my best guess is that they just want to do the most to guarantee results from the inside out but accutane is a pretty aggressive approach to glass skin one that a patient should have some input on all in all im healing up nicely and ill report back 36 months from now once the results are visible in summary pricing it seems like the lamiche approach is that they bundle together whatever they think will give you the best results and there isnt any transparency about individual pricing im not sure they even know their own pricing for individual treatments they are pretty loosey goosey with it if you want something you can certainly negotiate for it expect to spend at least 3000 for their bundled treatments this might be an affordable option if youre doing a whole list of treatments but good luck getting a quote consultation lamiche will hear out your skin concerns and then tell you what treatments youre getting no room for back and forth i cant say that their treatment plan was wrong i would have wanted the same thing for myself to their credit they didnt push any highrisk treatments like threads or filler and they didnt recommend any treatments that require more than one session to be noticeable just make sure that you speak up about every single concern in the initial consultation because if you request a treatment later someone will have to hunt down a doctor if i could do it over again i would have written a list of treatments to hand to the doctor in that initial consultation and said what do you think will give me the best results in one session if youre wanting indepth education about how the treatments work that doesnt happen here if youre curious one like me you must come prepared with your own research and ready to ask for exactly what treatments you want otherwise trust their process if you offer your input on how you want to structure your bundle you will get a little push back but if you advocate for yourself they will accept it service if youre accustomed to american customer service you will need to toughen up at lamiche one staff member told me you dont need to freak out youll have the chance to talk to a doctor when he does your treatments i dont think she knows how freak out translates to be condescending theres a cultural barrier and a language barrier and you wont get received with tea and smiles its a huge clinic and people look stressed because they are stressed work culture in korea is insane the right person for lamiche all in all i think lamiche might be the right fit for someone with a 3000 budget who wants a oneday transformation without having to research treatments who can just show up and let them throw every treatment in the mix and go home with a new face as long as you get the local anesthetic injections double check your meds with google and hug a teddy bear youll be finea bit shellshocked but fine overall id recommend that beginners start with a clinic like ppeum where you have transparent pricing in the binder with all the information about treatments pick one treatment to dip your toes in spend about 100300 go home and enjoy watching the results slowly reveal ppeum has a beautiful clinic space and they have a more streamlined process for foreigners you wont feel quite as lost or hustled even being a factory clinic and if the results arent exactly what you expected you only spent 300 not 3000 in conclusion i plan on being postive but honest in my collab video with lamiche as long as koreas strict defamation laws allow me ive noticed that a lot of the videos about lamiche clinic i trusted are clearly influencer content and im not sure if anyone else had a similar experience to me but its certainly not what i expected i dont think ill return to lamiche because my favorite part of the clinic visits are the consultations where i can learn more about the treatments that are so fascinating to me and if im paying my own money i need to feel 100 confident in the treatment plan giving me the best value

tuesday daily thread advanced questions weekly wednesday thread advanced questions dive deep into python with our advanced questions thread this space is reserved for questions about more advanced python topics frameworks and best practices how it works 1 ask away post your advanced python questions here 2 expert insights get answers from experienced developers 3 resource pool share or discover tutorials articles and tips guidelines this thread is for advanced questions only beginner questions are welcome in our daily beginner threaddailybeginnerthreadlink every thursday questions that are not advanced may be removed and redirected to the appropriate thread recommended resources if you dont receive a response consider exploring rlearnpython or join the python discord server for quicker assistance example questions 1 how can you implement a custom memory allocator in python 2 what are the best practices for optimizing cython code for heavy numerical computations 3 how do you set up a multithreaded architecture using pythons global interpreter lock gil 4 can you explain the intricacies of metaclasses and how they influence objectoriented design in python 5 how would you go about implementing a distributed task queue using celery and rabbitmq 6 what are some advanced usecases for pythons decorators 7 how can you achieve realtime data streaming in python with websockets 8 what are the performance implications of using native python data structures vs numpy arrays for largescale data 9 best practices for securing a flask or similar rest api with oauth 20 10 what are the best practices for using python in a microservices architecture and more generally should i even use microservices lets deepen our python knowledge together happy coding

the now this is going to garner gales of derision but nevertheless it has to be taken seriously there is a highly speculative hypothesis that while anything with mass cannot travel faster than the speed of light information can do so because information has no mass therefore information has no limitation the mechanism theorized is quantum entanglement the idea is that two bowes are created in a laboratory where a yes in one box causes there to be a yes in the other box if you change the yes to a no the other box instantaneously changes to a no you can move both boxes out of the laboratory and and separate them by a vast distance which takes a significant amount of time and still when you change one the other instantaneously changes now of course we have no idea whether this is a thing in the real world but we can be sure that if it does happen to be use then 3iatlas will be sure to have this technology so now we must pursue the question what if 3iatlas has this technology we can assume that 3iatlas will be dropping off a quantum entangled communication system at each lifebearing planet it visits at a minimum 3iatlas has visited at least 1000 such planets in the last few billion years however the chances if any of those planets hosting life which could actually use quantum entanglement may be extremely small most of the time these planets will have no intelligent life if they do have intelligent life that species may go extinct in a few thousand years the upshot of this is that not a single one of those thousand planets visited by 3iatlas will be operating quantum entangled communication qec now we will never be able to talk to any of them either now or in the future however robotic spaceships like 3iatlas will be able to talk to each other in the now for all the billions of years that they travel through the galaxy however qec would be a godsend for our future exploration of the solar system and for the development of asteroid mining the constraints of the speed of life already cripple our exploration currently every move that any space vehicle probe lander or rover has to be programmed in advance its behaviour must then follow the program even if this something unforeseen comes up that demands immediate attention this includes the flyby of pluto and its three close moons we were not expecting three the most ironic example is the mars rovers selection of rocks to analyze originally the rover would send photos back to earth and geologists would select targets and program the rover to approach each rock and fire a laser at it to determine its content but this was too slow instead the rover was programmed to fire its laser at any rock that looked like it might be of interest according to the constraints that the geologists programmed so now we have a rover wandering around mars shooting at things like it is in westworld and the rover will miss rocks which may have been of great interest because they did not fit the geologists constraints this sort of works in the familiar area of planetary surface but if we are to develop asteroid mining we must program spacecraft operation in a totally unknown realm of operation we will absolutely need qec to develop this industry in a timely manner this will enable us to operate asteroid mining equipment as though we are actually in the spacecraft operating it in real time so if 3iatlas has qec we want it this will not put us in touch with other alien lifeforms but it will keep us in touch with 3iatlas and all the other super intelligent space probes that communicate in the now

country living affordable homes with acreage for sale in arkansas arkansas often referred to as the natural state offers an abundance of outdoor beauty rich history and a slowerpaced lifestyle that caters to those seeking a retreat from urban living with sprawling landscapes serene lakes and lush forests its no wonder why many people are looking toward arkansas for their dream home for those who crave the peace and tranquility of country living without the hefty price tag there are numerous affordable homes with acreage available throughout the state this article delves into the benefits of country living in arkansas the types of properties available the regions to consider and tips on how to find the perfect home the allure of affordable acreage a breath of fresh air beyond the hustle and bustle of city life country living provides an escape to open spaces and a connection to nature imagine sipping coffee on your porch while overlooking vast fields or wooded land living on acreage means more than just space it fosters a lifestyle that enhances mental and physical wellbeing residents enjoy activities such as gardening horseback riding or simply wandering through expansive plots of land financial freedom homes with acreage in arkansas are often significantly less expensive than their urban counterparts this affordability allows individuals and families to invest in property without crippling their finances the cost of living in arkansas is substantially lower than the national average making it an attractive option for firsttime homebuyers retirees or anyone looking for a budgetfriendly lifestyle community and lifestyle country living often brings a sense of community that urban areas can lack many rural towns in arkansas are known for their friendly atmospheres where neighbors know one another and community events bring people together living in the countryside often means being able to partake in local fairs farmers markets and downhome hospitality types of properties available arkansas offers a diverse range of properties that cater to different needs and lifestyles heres a closer look at whats available farmhouses farmhouses are quintessential to rural living in arkansas many homes come with historical charm featuring spacious porches large kitchens and multiple bedrooms often set on acreage these properties provide ample room for gardening livestock or simply enjoying the expansive views cabins for those seeking a cozier retreat cabins can often be found in wooded areas providing a rustic feel while still being affordable cabins are excellent options for weekends or as permanent residences offering a peaceful escape in nature ranches ranches are perfect for individuals looking to continue or start farming operations many properties come with barns and outbuildings perfect for livestock or equipment ranches in arkansas can provide a selfsustainable lifestyle complete with farmtotable experiences land with no restrictions some buyers prefer to purchase raw land that they can develop according to their vision many parcels are available without restrictions allowing for the construction of custom homes tiny houses or any other type of dwelling one might envision regions to consider different areas of arkansas offer unique characteristics and advantages here are some noteworthy regions where you can find affordable homes with acreage ozark mountains the ozark region boasts rolling hills rivers and breathtaking views homes in this area often come with large plots of land that allow for privacy and seclusion perfect for outdoor enthusiasts who enjoy hiking fishing and exploring the great outdoors towns such as jasper and mountain home are known for their charming properties and access to stunning landscapes ouachita mountains located in the central region of arkansas the ouachita mountains offer beautiful wooded acres and lakes the town of hot springs is particularly famous for its thermal springs outdoor recreation and a vibrant arts scene properties here often come with ample acreage and easy access to natural parks delta region the arkansas delta is known for its agricultural land making it ideal for farming enthusiasts towns like stuttgart and blytheville provide affordable homes with plenty of land for crops or livestock the deltas rich culture includes music food and festivals contributing to a vibrant community life river valley the arkansas river valley offers fertile land and a welcoming community atmosphere areas like clarksville and russellville are known for their affordable homes with large yards and a plethora of outdoor activities here you can enjoy fishing kayaking and hiking along the riverbanks finding your dream home start with research before embarking on your home search its essential to do thorough research determine your budget desired location and specific requirements such as the number of bedrooms or acreage websites like zillow realtorcom and local real estate agencies provide comprehensive listings of properties available in arkansas visit local real estate offices sometimes the best deals are not listed online visiting local real estate offices can provide you with insights into upcoming listings or properties that may not yet be on the market local agents often have intimate knowledge of their communities and can guide you to the best options that fit your needs consider auctions auction sales in rural areas are an excellent way to find properties at potentially lower prices look for local auction events or online auction sites that specialize in real estate however be sure to do your homework on the property before making a bid to avoid unexpected costs attend open houses if you can attend open houses in the areas youre considering this allows you to get a feel for the property surrounding area and assess whether it meets your needs youll also have the chance to ask the seller directly about any questions or concerns you might have engage in networking joining community groups on social media or attending local events can open up opportunities engaging with locals may lead to discovering properties for sale that arent listed through traditional channels providing you with an edge in your search considerations before buying assessing land and property value when buying acreage its crucial to assess not just the home but the land itself consider factors like zoning laws land usage water rights and any restrictions that might impact your plans additionally its wise to research property taxes to avoid surprises down the line infrastructure and utilities evaluate the availability of essential services such as water electricity and internet access especially if youre moving to a more rural part of arkansas its important to ensure that connecting to utilities is feasible or that you have alternatives such as well water or solar power future development plans research potential future development plans in the area sometimes an affordable property can be in a good location but may face upcoming infrastructure changes that could affect the quality of life wildlife and nature considerations if youre considering properties near wooded areas or wildlife habitats ensure you understand local regulations regarding land usage and wildlife if youre inclined to hunt or selfsustaining lifestyle many homeowners utilize their land for gardens orchards or even raising livestock this not only promotes an ecofriendly lifestyle but can also reduce grocery bills outdoor activities country living opens the door to a myriad of outdoor activities hiking fishing bird watching and horseback riding are just the beginning with vast expanses of land many residents enjoy creating personal outdoor playgrounds for their families whether that means setting up trails for atvs building treehouses or simply enjoying evening bonfires under the stars cultural experiences living in arkansas also allows for immersion in local culture from folk music festivals to agricultural fairs theres always something happening in the community engaging in local traditions can deepen your connection to the area and its people a slower pace of life one of the most appealing aspects of country living is the slower pace with fewer distractions and a smaller community many find that life in rural arkansas allows more time for family hobbies and relaxation this shift in lifestyle often leads to improved mental health and overall happiness conclusion country living in arkansas offers a unique blend of affordability natural beauty and community spirit with various types of properties available from charming farmhouses to expansive ranches the dream of owning a home on acreage is within reach whether youre looking to raise a family start a farm or simply enjoy a serene lifestyle arkansas is a perfect choice for your country living aspirations by conducting thorough once cheated on me with 3 different guys all at once i withstood everything i could placing my mind is space of understanding that she cant control a lot of this behaviour shes in therapy and trying to get better there would be periods of time where she was getting better things appeared to be improving i was always proven wrong things would get too stressful for her shed put too much on her plate life would always become too much i was always the target i would always be the target when things became too much suddenly i wasnt doing enough i wasnt being supportive enough i needed to do more i had to do more all of my attention better be directed towards her no one else and nothing else if i didnt comply with her demands then i would be lashed out on i let it happen over and over again until i finally said no i was in therapy during most of this relationship i was learning to love myself understand what behaviours were and were not okay learning more about myself and understanding how i could be better for me she would constantly tell me how my therapist was bad for me how she was turning my against her so one night when i had plans to hang out with friends and minutes before i was to go be with them she decided i needed to be with her instead i said no 6 hours of her non stop berading me my parents on the phone witnessing her behaviour because i didnt feel safe being alone with her anymore we finally broke up i finally said i cant do it anymore by this time it was 1am she wanted me out after a few more hours of negotiation she finally agreed to just let me sleep on the couch her in the bed i would move out in the morning and so i did i moved back in with my parents i immediately felt free i didnt miss her i was ready to get into a relationship where i knew that i would be respected loved and cherrished for who i was not what i could offer so i got on dating apps met someone we talked for a month and it fizzled out no big deal i took some time off and reached out to an old friend we hit it off immediately she saw how much of an improvement i had made in myself she liked everything about me she was funny smart caring beautiful and overall an amazing women i asked her out on a date and she said yes we continued to talk and more and more she loved the person i had become but behind the scenes something was wrong something was wrong with me i was extremely nervous for the date i didnt know why my job requires me to talk to lots of people interact in different ways its never a challenge for me to spark up a conversation and be confident in myself we went on that date this past weekend eventually the nervousness wore off almost immediately but i wasnt okay i wanted so badly to have interest in what she was saying i just didnt i didnt have energy to be interested once we met in person i realized that i have walls thick walls that are up high i wanted so badly to charm her to say the right things to reinforce my interest and care for her i just couldnt get the words out she knew she wasnt dumb she fully understood that i wasnt ready for a relationship and i just hadnt realized it yet she tried so hard to make the date work and we talked for 4 hours we laughed and had fun but my level of interest in her it was practically non existant i just had no emotional energy left to give my batteries were empty i was tired i am tired she was so excited for the date and i let her down i realized from that date that being 3 months out of the worst 2 years of my life it wasnt time for me to be in a relationship i ruined what could have been a wonderful relationship with the most amazing women she messaged me the next day and said she didnt feel the connection she was hoping and that we should just be friends i declined being friends as i am not someone who can go back to being just friends with someone it wouldnt be right to me or her i left an open invitation that if she ever wanted to try again i would be up for it she agreed that she would reach out of she ever wanted to explore the connection again i am so ashamed that i tried too soon that i had not taken more time for myself i made the mistake of not better understanding that i wasnt ready thinking i could just jump right back in it without any issue i have so much trauma left over from that relationship so much engrained so deeply in me i broke down crying when i finally realized what had been eating at me i am still in therapy i reached out for an emergency session this week but i dont know what to do im drinking myself away night after night trying to deal with the emotions i am feeling its not healthy and goes directly against everything i am trying to acheive in therapy but how do you rebuild how do you pick up right where you left off how do you learn to trust another person and allow yourself to be vulnerable again when the person you were just with used that vulnerability against you over and over how do you unlearn those behaviors i dont know what to do i know there is no solid definitive answer to this i know time is involved i agreed with myself that i need to take a year to myself to heal to learn to trust again i just dont know where to start or what it looks like

should i just let my determined foster cat hang out under my bed or is there another solution im a firsttime foster for an approximately 1yo cat and have had him for just over 3 weeks he was brought in from outdoors to receive medical treatment and was pretty well socialized by his colonies caretaker beforehand but is still semiferal hes the only animal in my home in preparation to receive him i had blocked off all of my unders using a combination of poster board and cardboard he spent his first four days in a ferret cage that the rescue provided to help decompress i needed to get a video of him walking to send to the vet so i opened one of the doors after that and he showed a surprising amount of confidence in exploring my apartment i live in a studio so i just decided to give him fullreign of the space after that though wary of me he seemed to do well with this the first few days that was until he was able to fit into a gap i missed in blocking off underneath my bed i dont like him being underneath there because besides normal concerns like if there was a fire he seems to freeze and wont come out and eat as often and he is currently underweight he also will take significantly longer to warm up to me and seems very scared when hes under there ive tried reblocking off the area several times now but now that he knows the space exists he will determinedly figure out a way to get back underneath there when it is first reblocked off he will also pace back and forth in front of the bed meow and just generally seem like hes asking me to let him under i would like to note that he has several other hiding places available including a cat tree multiple different types of cat housesbeds and a covered kennel that ive tried to create positive associations with by feeding him or giving him treats in he doesnt react to catnip or silvervine i also did think at first that maybe i let him out into the full space too soon but when i tried closing him back into the ferret cage a couple of days after letting him out he got really upset and continuously tried to open the doors again is there anything else youd try is him having under bed access really that bad is there anything i can do to make under the bed a less risky place for him to hide he will come out on his own and spend time with me in the evening and i know hes exploring the apartment at night so socializationwise i feel like ive still been able to make progress

kickstart their adventure the complete guide to choosing dirt bikes for youth so your kid has the bug theyve seen motocross on tv maybe a friend has a bike and now theyre dreaming of roosting berms and exploring trails as a parent thats exciting but it can also be a little overwhelming where do you even start youve typed dirt bikes for youth into a search engine and now youre here welcome this isnt just a list of bikes this is your complete roadmap to making a safe smart and unforgettable choice for your young rider well cover everything from sizing and power to the essential gear that keeps them safe lets get ready to kickstart their adventure why dirt biking is a great choice for kids before we talk specs lets talk about the why introducing your child to riding is about more than just a cool hobby its a powerful tool for growth building confidence theres nothing like mastering a machine nailing a new skill whether its using the clutch or hitting a small jump builds immense selfesteem that carries over into all areas of life developing responsibility a youth dirt bike requires care from checking the tire pressure to helping with cleaning kids learn the importance of maintenance and respect for their equipment getting them outdoors in a world dominated by screens dirt biking is a powerful antidote its an adventure that gets them outside breathing fresh air and appreciating nature the first big decision gas vs electric click here to check the product on amazon this is the modern parenting question for motorsports both options are fantastic but they serve slightly different purposes gaspowered youth dirt bikes these are the traditional bikes that many of us grew up on they offer an authentic sensory experience with the sound and smell of a small engine pros authentic feel the classic riding experience with a clutch and engine braking longer ride times a full tank of gas can last for hours of riding wide selection theres a massive market and a huge range of models cons noise emissions they are loud and produce exhaust fumes more maintenance they require regular oil changes air filter cleaning and carburetor tuning best for kids who are serious about eventually racing families who have space to ride away from neighbors and those who value the traditional experience electric dirt bikes for kids silent clean and surprisingly powerful electric bikes have exploded in popularity they are fantastic learning tools pros quiet operation perfect for practicing in the backyard or in noisesensitive areas low maintenance no oil no gas no carburetor just charge and go controllable power most have multiple power modes allowing you to start your child on a very low safe setting cons limited run time ride time is limited by battery life typically 3090 minutes charging time once the battery is dead youre waiting for it to recharge click here to check the product on amazon best for younger beginners families in urbansuburban areas and kids who are intimidated by the noise and vibration of a gas engine sizing it right the most important factor getting the right size bike is nonnegotiable a bike thats too big is dangerous and intimidating a bike thats too small is uncomfortable and unsafe the golden rule is your child must be able to sit on the bike and firmly touch the balls of their feet to the ground this gives them the stability to stop and manage the bike use their height and inseam as a primary guide ages 37 the 50cc electric peewee class these are the smallest mini dirt bikes designed for the tiniest riders they typically have automatic clutches making them as easy to ride as a bicycle seat height 1822 inches top gas models yamaha pw50 autoclutch honda crf50f threespeed semiautomatic top electric models stacyc stability cycles balancebikelike oset 125 160 ages 711 the 65cc110cc class this is the sweet spot for many kids bikes are still manageable but offer more power and speed some will have a manual clutch which is a great skill to learn seat height 2530 inches top gas models honda crf110f kawasaki klx110 yamaha ttr110e top electric models surron light bee x for the more advancedlarger kid ktm sxe 5 ages 1014 the 125cc150cc class click here to check the product on amazon for the taller more experienced youth rider these bikes offer fullsized performance in a smaller manageable package they almost always feature a manual clutch seat height 3035 inches top gas models kawasaki klx140r honda crf125f yamaha ttr125le dont skimp the nonnegotiable safety gear the bike is only one part of the equation safety gear is not an option its a requirement dont let your kid ride without it heres the bare minimum checklist dotcertified helmet the single most important piece of gear replace it after any significant impact goggles protects eyes from roost dirt and branches riding boots overtheankle boots provide crucial support and protection gloves improves grip and protects hands jersey pants with armor or a separate chest protectorroost guard underneath neck brace a highly recommended piece of safety equipment that can prevent serious spinal injuries our top picks for dirt bikes for youth in 2024 if youre still wondering where to start here are a few standout models that are beloved by parents and kids alike 1 best beginner bike overall honda crf110f this bike hits the sweet spot for almost every beginner aged 712 its incredibly reliable has a smooth fourstroke engine a clutchless fourspeed transmission ease of use and just enough size to last them a couple of years its the gold standard for a first beginner dirt bike click here to check the product on amazon 2 best for the tiniest riders yamaha pw50 an absolute icon the pw50 is the quintessential first bike its tiny ultralightweight and features a shaft drive no chain to maintain and an adjustable throttle so you can control the power for a 46 year old its perfect 3 best performance path ktm 50 sx mini if you have a grom who shows real talent and might want to race the ktm 50 sx is the place to start its a mini race machine with highquality components a twostroke engine and a proper clutch its for the serious young rider 4 best quiet easy option stacyc 12edrive for the absolute youngest who are just learning balance the stacyc is a brilliant electric balance bike it introduces the concept of throttle and balance in a completely safe lowspeed way before they even move to a pedal bike ready to ride choosing the first of many dirt bikes for youth is a milestone moment by focusing on the right size prioritizing safety gear and choosing a bike that matches their enthusiasm and skill level youre setting them up for a lifetime of adventure and fun take your time involve your child in the process and always always put safety first what was your first dirt bike or what are you considering for your child drop your questions and stories in the comments below

a4a lf partner for a futuristic anime jrpg inspired space pirate space opera rp hello im looking for an rp partner that would like to collaborate in making a futuristic scifi and animejrpginspired roleplay about space pirates i dont necessarily have a plot nailed down yet but i was hoping i could find someone here that would be interested in collaborating to describe the vibe im going for some of my inspirations for creating this specific roleplay scenario includes mecha anime mobile suit gundam macross ttgl etc leiji matsumotos works space pirate captain harlock ge999 space battleship yamato etc futuristic jrpg series xenogearsxenosagaxenoblade star ocean phantasy star final fantasy honkai star rail etc basically anything that fits this aesthetic is something id love to write about and it would be great to find an rp partner who is also interested in making an original universe and setting inspired by these too about me im 30 years old and go by hehim or theythem ive just returned to the world of roleplaying after i used to rp a lot back when anime forums were a thing im going to grad school to pursue my mfa in creative writing with a focus on poetry outside of writing my hobbies include video games i particularly love rpgs indies retro games typically the more obscure old and weird stuff animemanga reading and spending time with my cats about my oc my oc is a space pirate named galleon he is by all accounts a lousy one though he may have the looks and the style down pat of a space pirate every attempt to enact space piracy ends in a miraculous failure due to his own incompetence i basically told myself what if i took all my favorite characters from anything ever and put them all into one guy and thats how he was born from my mind palace a few of his biggest character inspirations are squall leonhart from final fantasy viii captain harlock from the leiji matsumoto universe and dandy from space dandy his weapon of choice is a gunblade nicknamed hyperion sorry not sorry for more ff8 references hes admittedly a very selfindulgent character since hes a manifestation of some of my favorite characters from like everything ever however i feel like i have some really good ideas for him that i would love to explore more of with other ocs what im looking for im looking for someone who is enthusiastic about creating worlds and characters someone that wants to brainstorm and build deep stories character interactions lore and everything in between id also be super interested in slowburn romance because honestly im just a sucker for romance and shipping characters lmao just feel free to let me know what youre interested in exploring because i am an open book im literate in my writing and typically prefer writing anywhere from 34 paragraphs i dont have any hard requirements for response times either i have adhd and my motivation fluctuates rapidly and sometimes i just genuinely forget to respond in a timely manner also everyone has their own lives to live and i 100 empathize with that with that being said im open to discuss what works for the both of us lastly chatting ooc would be a plus im always down to make new friends and talk about mutual interests and such final thoughts thank you very much for reading i do hope this all comes across coherently i have a tendency to have a grand idea and then do terribly at explaining it at the end of the day i love roleplaying and the things i like motivate me to create things like this in the event youd be interested please dont hesitate to reach out and id be happy to talk with you have a great evening

when i was eight i was friends with the fairies in my yard but then they started to go missing i was looking for my grammys ring when i found him grammy had given me her ring before she died and losing it felt like losing her mom forgot to pay the electricity bill again and i only felt safe with the ring i will say as a child our house was always dark i did get used to it eventually mom couldnt afford electricity so we usually sat in candlelight but when mom was passed out after drinking too much my brother and i were stuck grammys ring was the only thing that made me feel safe i knew i was wearing it in the yard while playing in the flowers after school and the thought of a night without it twisted my gut before she passed my grandma was our unofficial guardian after school we would walk all the way to her house and she would make us dinner and let us watch tv but after she died we didnt have anyone just mom and a pitchdark house the sky was darkening when i rushed outside kneeling in moms flower garden ross my brother sometimes locked me out if i stayed out too long his fear stemmed from our father coming home from work when we were younger and destroying the kitchen if his dinner wasnt made not much to say about dad he left us a year later yes he took all moms savings but the house was quiet sometimes i intentionally sat in the yard at night our neighbors usually watched tv at 8pm and i could see the reflection in the front window i once watched a whole episode of a tv show i had no idea what it was but i think it was about space on that particular night it was too cold to sit outside i was wearing moms coat over my pajamas grasping my flashlight rosss face was in the window lit up by moms phone also our only light i gestured for him to leave the door open and he just pressed his face against the glass making kissy faces ever since dad left my brother insisted on being the male of the house repeating what dad would always say when we did have electricity rarely my brother would force me to microwave him frozen meals because he was the male of the house now that dad was gone i wasnt expecting him to leave the door unlocked which meant another night of crawling up the drainpipe and through my bedroom window i focused on grammys ring kneeling in the flowers i grasped at anythingrocks pebbles crumbling flower buds old beer cans a voice startled me and i almost toppled over its over here the squeak came from a wilted rose and i briefly wondered if i was seeing things bobby one of my friends in elementary school once bragged that his father ate mushrooms and thought he was a bird i became fascinated with the idea and bobby and i spent a whole slumber party googling mushrooms i vaguely remembered my mother planting some when we were younger but they were the edible kind the ones she used in her winter soup so if i wasnt seeing things if i wasnt high on mushroom spores then what exactly did i hear hello im sorry are you blind im down here all i could see was my mothers flower bed i shined my flashlight on it peering closer and there when i crawled directly into a crushed rosebush was a glowing ball of light i found myself mesmerized by it hypnotized by light that i wasnt used to whipping my head around i searched for my brother his shadow was gone closer now the ball of light morphed into a tiny human perched on a leaf legs swinging the boy looked like a high schooler glass wings poking from his back a scowl on his face i couldnt believe what i was seeing mom used to warn ross and me about the fairies when we were little she said it was the fairies who stole our toys made us sneeze and the fairies who chased away our father ross didnt believe in them but i was always intrigued i asked my friends at school if they had fairies at the bottom of their yards and they thought i was weird i remember mom telling us if you do a fairy a favor they will return it by granting you a wish but she also warned if you hurt a fairy you will pay for it and your children will pay for it and your childrens childrens children will suffer they will hunt to the end of your bloodline and even then their mere presence will drive adults insane i wondered if shed gotten that from a book before she started drinking mom used to tell us stories about the fairies in our yard and how when she was a little girl she helped a captive fairy prince freeing him from her neighbors bell jar maybe they were protecting her after all the one in front of me was scowling before his expression softened hi the fairy whispered tilting his head he looked maybe seventeen or eighteen i had no idea how that translated to fairy years contrary to what books movies and tv shows had led me to believe barbie fairytopia being my only real reference fairies didnt wear dresses the one in front of me was dressed in scraps of human clothing an old checkered shirt wrapped around his torso strips of denim for pants and a satchel slung across his chest i leaned closer spying a clothes tag sticking from his back he was definitely wearing the material of one of my fathers old shirts his satchel or at least the faux leather holding it together looked very similar to my moms bag i dont think i fully put into words what i was seeing a real fairy sitting in my mothers flower garden he wore a wry smile unlike the boys at school who teased me for having holes in my shoes and no gym uniform his smile was friendly heres your silver thingy he gave his curls a shake my grammys ring crowning him can you maybe take it off my head he stood throwing out his arms to keep balance and slowly i reached forward and plucked grammys ring from his curls revealing his real crown an entanglement of flowers vines and tiny mushrooms he backed away quickly hiding behind the shadow of a rosebud im not supposed to talk to you he said shifting nervously i didnt tell my father i was here so i should probably go home before he um gets mad i found myself wondering if placing him in a bell jar and using him as a lantern would help me sleep his light stole away my breath it pulsed like a living thing spiderwebbing down delicate glass wings sticking from his back i shook my head shaking away the thought but i did want to touch his light i wanted to know if it was ice cold or maybe warm mom told me she had only ever held a fairy once i introduced myself hesitantly holding out my palm i didnt realize i was shaking until i quickly retracted my hand swiping my clammy fingers on my pajamas lit up in otherworldly golden light his skin porcelain almost translucent wide green eyes blinked at me jude he said his wings twitching he hopped onto my hand wobbling and throwing his arms out to balance himself prince jude he smiled proudly pointing to his crown jude and i became friends and he introduced me to his family his father was understandably absent i spent a lot of time in the yard so eventually ross caught on he followed me one day springing out at me when i was talking to jude initially he thought i was talking to a butterfly ross liked jude immediately holding out his palm for the fairy to land on especially when he realized the fairy could help us with our light problem jude said in exchange for our full names he would happily act as light for us until we fell asleep i was more than happy to comply i gave him our names and jude became a regular visitor sitting on top of the microwave with his legs swinging illuminating the counter so we could prepare food jude showed off dancing across my dead phone screen causing it to flicker on and off ross was impressed his eyes wide wait so you can make things actually work jude shrugged if theres enough of us i mean sure there was one night when ross accidentally sat on him and he squeaked in pain buzzing around like an angry mosquito a glowing ball of light growing brighter and brighter until the whole room was lit up it was so bright like an overexposed photo light bleeding into the darkness of the hallway lighting up the living room doorway ross apologized and jude instantly forgave him telling us anecdotes of his family and world and how he had grown up as a reluctant prince according to him jude didnt want to be a prince however as the son of the king he was the rightful heir to the throne fairies dont like candy i was surprised too i grew up with mom whispering in my ear leave a berry at the bottom of the yard and perhaps he will come see you i offered jude a chunk of gummy worm and he spat it out jude said his kind eat an assortment of foods but are carnivores he showed me his teeth elongated spikes and i wished he hadnt i guess i was just a kid i thought fairies were mini versions of humans with wings of a butterfly when mom described them she always painted them as creatures from a fairytale i didnt expect them to have teeth sharp enough to rip through my finger still jude was my friend he had sharp teeth but he didnt scare me jude came to see me at night sitting on my window a glowing ball of orange comforting me in the dark mom never came to tuck me in or say goodnight so his light really did help when i turned ten years old i went to france on a school field trip for a week i told ross to look after jude and jude to keep an eye on my brother i remember the france trip wasnt as fun as i thought it would be i spent the whole time missing jude and his family and my brother who wasnt answering my texts or calls i came down with food poisoning after eating slimy looking clams one girl puked all over her seat on the plane and our teacher almost had a nervous breakdown but it was my brothers lack of contact that contorted my gut into knots i texted him almost 50 times over the duration of three days and i didnt even get a read receipt when i returned home i was relieved to find jude perched on a daffodil he seemed quieter than normal and i admit as a ten year old kid i wanted him to miss me and say how excited he was for me to be back jude didnt speak much at all that night i remember it was summer so i spent most of the afternoon and evening hanging out with him but he didnt speak eventually when i poked him offering him honey he was obsessed with honey its the fairy equivalent of getting high he opened up to me hopping onto my outstretched palm my friends are disappearing he said softly i noticed he was glowing brighter all of the color drained from his cheeks dark circles prominent under his eyes he sighed laying down in my palm i liked that he trusted me enough to be vulnerable jude once told me his father was against him talking to humans the king saw us as parasites and evil looming monstrous things dad thinks its a human jude sighed rolling around in my palm pressing his face into his arms i told him its not humans are nice i have two human friends he explained in the gentlest of tones and i could tell it really did hurt him to say it that he couldnt see me anymore ill be king in a month so dad doesnt want me to explore anymore jude didnt say goodbye i think he was too emotional he just told me it was nice knowing a friendly human before hopping off my wrist and flying away a single buzzing light disappearing into the trees i was determined to find his missing friends so i did what i could i set honey traps trying to lure them out from wherever they were i figured they had run away from home i had the naive idea that finding them would bring jude backand my kindness would prove humans are good and judes father was wrong about us i drew up plans to find judes friends and bring them back to the kingdom ross had been quiet ever since i got back from france he said he was doing homework in his room but when i bothered checking he was curled up under his blankets with a flashlight the beam illuminating his shadow when i asked what he was doing he held up a copy of carrie im reading he grumbled so i left him alone judes friends were nowhere to be seen i gave up halfway through summer vacation when it was clear jude wasnt coming back and i was wasting my time it had been months since id last seen him and i had spent the majority of the time when i wasnt searching for the missing fairies playing with my new friends i didnt tell them about jude or the fairies or even where i lived i was embarrassed of our neighborhood i was embarrassed of our broken gate our uncut lawn that was almost up to my knees and my mothers refusal to actually be a parent with these new friends i could be a whole other person frankie without the father who left and an alcoholic mother frankie whos brother hadnt spoken to me in weeks however when my friends were pulled inside for dinner i had no choice but to return home with jude it was bearable i could forget that i hadnt washed my hair in weeks because we didnt have money for shampoo or that the other girls in class were already pointing out lice crawling in my hair with jude i could forget about all of that without him without my parents and brother and grandma i was starting to feel empty i stepped inside my house surprised by the unfamiliar light of the tv mom was already passed out on the couch but it looked like shed been watching a gameshow dads crystal lamp normally switched off was lit up brighter than normal i had to shade my eyes blinking through intense white light i opened the refrigerator comforted by light and pulled out a bottle of water it was icecold i was so used to lukewarm mom had finally paid the electricity bill i cant describe how fucking relieved i was i had a hot shower and made myself a frozen meal i could hear my brother playing video games screaming threats at the screen i poked my head through the door did mom pay the electricity bill ross rolled his eyes smashing buttons slumped on his beanbag obviously i threw a stuffed animal at him and he of course lobbed it back aiming for my face i glimpsed a faded glitter of light under his blankets is your flashlight faulty i asked rosss gaze didnt leave the tv screen i was using it as a reading light but the stupid thing wont work properly its broken i told him he could have mine and that was the first time my brother smiled at me thanks i ran upstairs to grab my mothers laptop to do homework this was the first time we had electricity in months and i was going to take advantage but it was when i entered my room my bedside lamp was too bright the amount of times i had wished for it to be turned on during winter nights when it was so cold and not even my blankets could warm me up the cold dark bulb had always been painful like being stabbed in the back light was so close and yet so far that i couldnt reach it i rushed over to turn it off but something stopped me dead voices tiny screeching squeaks swallowing bile i inched closer peering into the lamp the sight sent me retracting my stomach in my throat my cheeks burning i could see their tiny bodies cruelly taped to the burning bulb tossing turning and flailing their skin dripped from their bones and caught alight glowing hair burned from their scalps revealing the white bone of tiny fairy skulls their innocent screams sent me stumbling back dropping onto my knees ill never forget that image its burned into my mind ill never forget their screams the more they cried begged and screeched the brighter the light burned scorching the bulb pain made them brighter the realization made me heave i didnt think stifling my sobs i burned my finger plucking yuri judes older brother from the lamp tearing him from the cruel duct tape restraints pinning him down i first met yuri when he got tangled in my hair and i laughed so hard i almost puked trying to pull him out of my thick ponytail he was kind collegeaged with stories of his time overseas yuri teased jude like my brother teased me pushing him off flower buds and ruffling his hair yuri wasnt moving his head hanging his wings charred i could see where half of his face had peeled away leaving pearly white bone framing a skeletal grin when i gently prodded him panicking his head lolled forwards he was dead and yet somehow he was still producing light what are you doing ross snatched yuri from my grasp squeezing the fairy between his fist i felt sick watching intense golden light bleeding through his fingers without a word he placed yuri back inside the lamp tightening the duct tape over his tiny body i noticed yuris wings twitching slightly he wasnt dead but was so close ross turned to me and i remember my brothers eyes terrified me you said you wanted light he snapped gesturing to the lamp so i got us light i tried to protest tried to free judes brother ross shoved me into the wall if you touch them he spat i will fucking kill you i tried to get past him i tried to save judes brother this time i snatched him up and ross pulled him from my grasp shoving him in his jeans pocket he treated them like dolls we have light thats what ross kept saying but he was fucking hurting them theyre giving us light frankie when ross locked me out of the house again i tried to call to jude i was ashamed of my brother but lying to him felt wrong but jude never came back fortunately for me all children get bored and move to the next thing after spending weeks torturing fairies for light my brother started hanging out with friends from school so when i had the opportunity i freed every single fairy and tried to help them nursing them back to health fifteen fairies survived out of 25 i only remember several of their names lyra who was my brothers night light faura who was glued to the kitchen bulb jax and svan twins inside my brothers bedside light yuri was dead i wont describe him because doing so would be disrespectful i buried him in the yard with the others and said a prayer for them the tv was still switched on when i slumped onto the couch next to my unconscious mother the television confused me because i was sure it was a single fairy per electrical appliance but when i checked the outlet there were no fairies i had saved every fairy and every time i freed one my house was noticeably darker but it did have electricity i checked the refrigerator oven and my brothers ps4 above me the kitchen bulb flickered on and then off somehow my house did have electricity but it was weak so what was causing it hesitantly i crept down to the basement where the generator wasand already i could hear it the furious buzzing of wings sharp cries of pain jude was cruelly hooked up to the machine his tiny scrambling body pulsing like a heart among colorful wires and flashing buttons his light had dimmed flickering weakly one wing was gone the other shredded when i reached out with trembling fingers to pluck him from the wires they wouldnt let go ross had forced them inside him using him not just as a generator of light but a battery his eyes flickered as they found me rolling back and forth unfocused i pulled him as gently as i could untangling him from the cruel wires threaded through his skin wrapped around his head he didnt reply when i spoke his name his lips quivered sharp panicked breaths sending him into coughing fits his body burned with fever his clothes clinging to him blood trickling from his nose i tried to snap him out of it but his wings werent moving when i whispered his name he didnt respond his chest shuddering i knew he wasnt going to make it when i cupped him in my hand he lay still moving only when i prodded him i tried bathing him with a sponge to ease the burns to his face but its like his body was giving up i dropped him in a panic and he just lay there his father was right when judes light started to erupt brighter and brighter i laid him down in my mothers roses i tried to bury him but burying him didnt feel right i sat for so long in the dirt trying to think of a way to make things right and honor his memory but i didnt know what to say to him i didnt know what to tell his father i felt sick with guilt that same night my mother came to her senses she sat up with wide eyes her lips trembling what did you do when i couldnt respond she grabbed my shoulders screaming in my face what did you do her eyes were filled with tears red raw like she knew i admitted to her that ross had killed a fairy and i didnt know what to do mom didnt speak its like she was in a trance she stood up slowly grabbed matches stormed outside and set her flower bed alight when i tried to stop her she told me if she didnt then i would die mom told me when losing someone you love death is the kindest way her voice dropped into a sharp cry thats not what they do they will hunt you they will make you wish you were dead she shook me tried to hug me her breath ice cold against my ear please baby she whispered tell me you didnt give them your names i didnt couldnt answer frankie mom made me look at her her lips parted in a silent cry you didnt right she began to moan like an animal her eyes rolling back she started to chant please tell me you didnt give the fairies with teeth your names please tell me you didnt give the fairies with teeth your names please tell me you didnt give the fairies with teeth your names mom was arrested when the neighbor caught her dancing barefoot across the burned flowerbed singing a language i didnt understand my brother and i were placed into cps and moved states thankfully i was placed with a different family while ross lived with our aunt i entered my teens and had a pretty much normal life i live with a new family two moms and a step brother and sister who are my age until a few days ago i got the call while i was eating my breakfast ross was dead according to my aunt it was a brain aneurysm but she kept screaming down the phone about holes holes in my brothers brain that shouldnt have been there she found him faced down in her yard with a hole inside his head like something burrowed its way inside his brain she cried like an insect frankie i made plans to attend his funeral and i guess i was numb for a few days losing ross felt like losing the last connection i had to my childhood last night my step brother harry poked his head through the door very funny he rolled his eyes its not even april fools yet i must have looked confused because he held up his toothpaste where a gnawing fucking hole had eaten through the plastic termites i told harry this morning i woke to screams that are still haunting me now my step mothers shrieks wouldnt stop slamming into me i heard the thud thud thud of my step sister running down the stairs and then her screech harry was faced down in our front yard a giant hole in the back of his head like something had burrowed through his skull i ran upstairs to grab my phone to call the cops and a spot of light caught my eye sitting on the window his legs swinging arms folded was jude he was older a crown adorning thick brown curls his wings were still slightly charred but he was alive i didnt recognize his eyes i remembered them being filled with warmth and curiosity now they were hollow sparkling with madness jude smiled widely before spitting a chunk of fleshy pink on the windowsill he didnt speak didnt explain himself instead he shot me a two fingered salute and flew away a buzzing orange light that i swear was laughing look i know hes doing this for his brother but im terrified hes going to kill me he killed my brother and my step brother does jude even know i tried to save him is he punishing me what should i do mom is locked up in a psych ward and she burned all of her books i just need to know how do i keep him away from me edit 2 something is seriously fucking wrong i just got a call from my step mom harry is okay hes coming home right now mom thinks its a miracle she keeps telling me harry cant wait to talk to me thats all shes saying harry keeps saying how excited he is to talk to you he cant wait to see you but how can he be okay

have you ever misheard someone misgendering you almost like a stress hallucination i know many folks are jaded about pronouns so this might be an uncomfortable thing to bring up this is something ive noticed at my work customers have come in a few timesill greet them when they come in and watch them go on their way oftentimes you can kind of hear the muffled conversation with people who are out of range if i could hear an ee or er in the cacophony of their exchange when they were walking away my brain would assume they were misgendering me but ive been surprised a number of times when theyve come back into hearing range and as the volume of their conversation became more audible it was clear that they probably werent just from the intonation and the naturalness i realized that they were probably using the right pronouns its okay if you think its wishful thinking hoping this thread can be a nonjudgmental space i wont be replying to comments this time just putting this out here for people to explore together if theyre interested 3
