aita need advice hello friends i started identifying as poly roughly two years ago i started having feelings about it in a previous relationship and because that person amongst other issues reacted viscerally at the thought we ended and i began to explore that part of me with someone else a few months later ive not participated much in the community before this but im learning and doing my best to understand what is appropriate and what it not im having a hard time understanding right now if what im feeling is valid and looking for guidance on whether or not an issue im having is because of me or the other person two years ago i began seeing someone we will call them john for convenience who was in a relationship as we were flirting they had not disclosed they were in a relationship let alone engaged it wasnt until i asked them on a date after talkingflirting for roughly 2 weeks that they disclosed they were in a relationship we attempt to go on dates and spend time together boundaries were communicated on what wasnt and was okay john often took the lead as i trusted them to maintain their partners boundaries after intimacy i learn that we had crossed a boundary from there it was the same thing boundaries communicated boundaries crossed 90 of the time with me not knowing what was happening wasnt okay it ultimately lead to the end of their relationship and the end of ours after a one year struggle i know my behavior was wrong and i took the time to work on myself fast forward a few months they come back into my life we talk about what happened how everyone got hurt how we would do things differently and how we wish and have grown as people with things being different the assured me they were ready for a relationship with me john told me they had another partner we will call her lucy what struck me as odd as i had asked them multiple times if they were seeing lucy intimately while hanging out in shared spaces and they lied saying they were not in a relationship either way i stated a firm boundary that if they desired to be my partner i would need to meet lucy we met lucy was great and we proceeded to have a kitchen table poly relationship for about 34 months eventually john starts to feel they werent ready to be in a relationship after their previous relationship all that time healthy practice and boundary upholding behavior became unstable john broke up with lucy then proceeded to break up with me however they expressed a desire to still see me intimately and that it just wasnt a commitment they explained they had no intention of dating anyone any time soon nor being intimate with anyone else okay we remain in this dynamic of were not together but i want a long relationship with you in the future for about maybe two months one day were casually chatting and they drop the bomb theyre on dating apps to meet friends they said okay thats fine as long as i know and youre being intentional about what you want on said dating apps i shared some anxieties but chose to trust them and what they believe they need i guess they met quite a few people but they only bothered to mention two to me and one instance where they drove three hours spontaneously to the ren fair i showed curiosity about their time there the conversation seemed uncomfortable but not just on my end 23 weeks later they ask me how i would feel if they started going on dates im uncomfortable with this and i tell them why i tell them im uncomfortable knowing that they are going on dates with people when they show no initiative to go on dates with me met with excuses like our schedules never line up and that its a dangerous game to be playing with peoples feelings when theyre incapable of being in a committed relationship they brush it off and bring it up again i repeat myself count two days later they admit to me theyve gone on a date lets say with charlie to me i nearly left then i had felt so unheard i told them my discomfort how uncomfortable it felt to basically be mislead about their use of the dating apps and mislead that my feelings concerns and ability to openclose our relationship since they specifically told me our relationship was closed after breaking up i calmed down yet strained to accept any continuation with charlie after feeling my trust be shot down they expressed they did not desire for a relationship just that they wanted to date and intimacy was currently off the table with charlie until they met charlies partner i calmed down just enough to stay with them trust them fast forward maybe 2 days and i attempt to set boundaries and explain i need time after my trust was hurt to adjust to them seeing someone new all of those boundaries are challenged because were not in a relationship we butt heads they act like im controlling meanwhile im just asking for them to slow down instead they press on the gas they pressure me to allow this person where we work together and i set a firm no that is my space that i work at every day and john is only there one time a month these are my people my space my second home they act like a toddler acting like they had every right to bring someone else into my space i just wasnt ready for after the trust they broke they then start expressing they do actually want an intimate relationship and that they will be engaging in such acts with charlie im aghast at the complete switch up and was given no time at all to even adjust to them seeing other people again they say its just sex and probably wont lead to anything and this is some kind of regular poly experience to be so much more invested in something new this ultimately lead to me excusing myself from the relationship if they cannot slow down i cannot keep up and we keep arguing about what isnt and is appropriate for two people who arent in a commitment but still have full intention of being in a long term relationship we shouldnt keep doing the same things i feel like theyre back to who they were in the beginning acting like my feelings and boundaries matter but then switching up and doing those things anyways just to me this time not to mention i just find out from my work friends that john had invited someone to our work from one of their dating apps without my knowledge a part of me feels they do not desire to be in a commuted relationship because they do not want to consider my feelings when it comes to what they do they just want what i give to a committed relationship and avoid all responsibility of what it means to love and cultivate something its so messy and i dont feel like im wrong to feel this way but i would love to hear from more experienced people on if john looks like someone who can be trusted with a polyamorous relationship if i should be giving them the last chance i have

where is the shadow realm in relationship to war gods realm from what we have seen the shadow realm is below the other realms from the underworld to hopes kingdom and heart gods realm shadow gods realm was always below them even before the realm fused into one realm the dream realm so in relationship to war gods realm where is the shadow realm obviously below war gods realm right just imagine your an astronaut exploring space and you were assigned to explore space mapping out space of all its planetsstars and galaxies when you start mapping out a part of space where there is less starts continuing to explore this part of space you notice that this part of space just doesnt have starts the deeper you go the more lightless it becomes until there was no more light after a while you just start to believe there is nothing here when suddenly you are met with an invisible barrier you dont know how there was invisible barrier there but there was past the invisible barrier you could see light someway and somehow you managed to get pass the barrier and start falling against all of your logic there was gravity here where there was none in space you see that light was a storm of essence from dissolving shadows and against your logic at the bottom of space there was land congratulations you have entered the shadow realm

29 m4f online seeking a woman who values deep conversations real connection hello im a 29m from brazil sometimes the nights feel especially quiet and we all crave a little warmth and connection im here looking for a woman to build a genuine honest and loyal connection that can grow into something meaningful lately ive realized how much i miss simple sincere communication where kindness honesty and mutual support are at the center i want someone where we can share lifes little moments have hearttoheart conversations support each other and just be ourselves you could say solitude isnt always beneficial meaningful connections are rare and i still believe in finding someone special to build something that can last perhaps for many years a bit about meim an empathetic and kind person i invest my time in those i care about i support them and stay there until the end im somewhere between introvert and extrovert more extroverted online i work from home so im usually around im nerdy and passionate about technology scifi retrofuturism cyberpunk science history space and other cultures i love stories that explore solitude meaning and the fragile side of being human worlds like blade runner the expanse arcane ghost in the shell and battlestar galactica captivate me im drawn to goth and cyberpunk aesthetics medieval worlds and the vibe of the 70s and 80s i love documentaries music from soundtracks and classical to artists like erika lundmoen and youtube i also enjoy the sound of rain peaceful mornings and moments to reflect i like to share memes or random videos or sometimes just laugh and talk about life random thoughts jokes and deeper topics i can cook and im always trying to improve my mind jumps between subjects its just how i think ive grown up alone without a family so my dream has always been to have one someday my life is complex but i try my best im a homebody and prefer meaningful oneonone time i love tea fruit juice and cats though i dont have pets right now as im focusing on my goals my political views are centrist slightly conservative lately my life has been in transition but im actively working toward my goals and dreams im open about my struggles and growth what im looking for im looking for a woman who is not just there but someone where we multiply each other where 11 equals more than 2 someone where we can spend time on voice calls studying together watching a series or movie or just enjoying each others company i connect with women who are down to earth who have their own life and essence who talk about deep topics and share what they feel i know any relationship will probably be longdistance at first but maybe someday we can meet and travel together im not someone who likes crowds so i prefer meaningful places but honestly if im with someone i care about even simple things like eating street food become meaningful if youre someone who like me was once betrayed by those you loved you know how it feels to crave genuine love i dont know if such a woman exists but im looking for you i value reciprocity in conversation mutual care support sweet words of love random memes videos voice notes longer texts creative gestures and quality time spent together matter deeply to me i dont drink or smoke my preference depends on the connection we build if theres genuine chemistry appearance matters less who im not looking for im not looking for someone who isnt emotionally available or doesnt know what they want i need clarity and honesty from the start if youre unsure about pursuing a connection or not ready to invest emotionally i understand but were probably not in the same place im not here to be someones maybe or a backup option while you figure things out im also not looking for someone who keeps multiple options open or creates emotional triangles someone looking for validation while exploring other connections someone who cant communicate honestly about their feelings and intentions someone who has no time to actually invest in building a connection if youre a woman 2133 emotionally available kind and curious id love to hear from you please share a bit about yourself beyond a simple hi what excites you what are you passionate about or what small things make your days meaningful generic hi messages will be ignored a note about this post i used all my effort to make this as clear as possible english isnt my first language but i wanted to be transparent and communicate as best as i can

constellations planets and other sky objects using the stellarium app ive also purchased celestron cometron 7x50 astronomy binoculars following the guide pinned on the subs description thanks for this amazingly extensive piece of information btw and im really loving it my favorite objects so far are the orion nebula and surrounding constellation the moon obviously and the brighter planets like jupiter saturn and mars now i would like to take the next step and purchase a telescope i have been looking through the guide and websites of telescope vendors and ive come to a final 3 or 4 options the options im considering are the skywatcher heritage 150 the celestron starsense explorer either 114mm or 130mm and the skywatcher heritage virtuoso the latter is not mentioned by the guide but it has a great focal length its very compact not too expensive and seems to have some advanced electronic control features this article by the bbc is not very enthusiastic about it but also not completely pessimistic i have also considered the skywatcher 8 classic dob but i want something more mobile for now finally i looked into smart telescopes eg seestar s30 but thats also not exactly what im looking for at the moment since im still a bit in doubt and very much a beginner i would like to ask the subs opinion about these scopes especially the heritage virtuoso since its not mentioned by the guide i also dont really understand the difference between the heritage 150 and starsense explorer why is the starsense considered better if it has less focal length aperture etc is it because of the starsense guidance thanks in advance to everyone helping out also another big thanks to everyone who contributed to all the information provided in the subs wiki edit including some more details my budget is up to 500 ideally i want to be able to observe planets and bright nebulae from my balconies i live in europe in bortle 7 skies but i will consider driving to bortle 4 and 3 skies relatively nearby finally i want to be able to easily carry the scope from one balcony to another and move it from inside to outside etc

otheronlineaedtgmt11sunday homebrew campaign of mongoose traveller 2e time weekly game on sunday mornings between 10am and 121pm australian eastern daylight savings time effectively each session will be between 23 hours long well be using roll20 and discord elevator pitch as the crew of a trading ship make your way through the galaxy in an attempt to survive and make profit im looking for a few more players to join an ongoing campaign full pitch players will be given a ship and a galaxy to explore the games focus will be mostly sandbox exploration players will have reign to go where they please and attempt to make a living in the galaxy theyll be a running plot throughout and hooks but ultimately itll be up to the players to where and how they make their money and mark on the verse the system mongoose traveller 2e if you havent played traveller its one of the granddaddy scifi rpgs from the late 70s but has gone through several editions theres a lot of information about the various editions out there but ill be running the mongoose 2e with the 2022 changes the universe is large and basically its designed to give players a blank state to explore to give a scale of how big the galaxy is heres the map to game has vibes of the expanse firefly rumored to be based on a traveller game joss whedon ran stars without numbers which is a toned down version of this and even light shades of things like battletech and shadowrun although all of this came after traveller effectively its a space opera with a bent towards hard scifi if any of this is starting to tickly your fancy send me a message and well go from there

experimenting with signature sound effects for cinematic tension ive been exploring how certain sounds can act as emotional anchors in film scores those deep textures that make dune and arrival feel otherworldly i have designed 200 underscore element such as horns ebow tones that lean into space and heat for anyone curious you can listen here

thanks for all the support and memories 3 a farewell message and upcoming mashit avatar 1111 i want to take this opportunity to share a heartfelt thank you to all of you who have supported me and my work throughout the years its been such an incredible whirlwind of a journey from gen3 hype twitter spaces and minting in 2023 to times square billboards and artist showcases launching avatars to all of you truly and for the first time helped me feel like a real artist and ill forever be grateful to those who decided to collect my artwork through the avatars program with the closure of the reddit shop comes the end of an era with no new avatar releases moving forward it understandably can feel disheartening it certainly isnt the path i would have chosen at the same time sometimes the end of one era simply means the start of a new and different era your stillfunctional avatars collections technically become more limited supply cuts across the board and this can open things up to explore alternative options for growth into the future where do we head from here a few directions 1 i plan to keep exploring new avenues for accelerating my art wherever it makes sense in this past year ive done art collabs with skullx on ordinals seen my art on physical bobu beer cans in the eu and had my art in nyc times square billboard and pellas gallery one night showcases ill keep looking for ways to bring visibility to my work and if you have any suggestions would welcome you to share 2 exploring devvit games while avatar sales may be ending reddit still remains a popular platform that has quite a large audience ive recently explored some very preliminary development of an avatar battle game on reddit that lets you use your avatar mashup to battle opponents on the site everyone who wins at least one battle gets their avatar added to the matchup rotation for other people to fight too you can check it out here while i cant guarantee future development i think it seems like a really fun way to bring new life to avatars and hopefully reach broader audiences too so if you have any ideas for future iterations id welcome any thoughts or suggestions thanks to all who have already played it 3 mashitio avatars artists and devs in the reddit community have put together mashit to fill the void that reddit is leaving with a fully functional avatar salesdropsmashing platform built on polygon ill be joining their phoenix drop nov 11 preview in image aiming to launch my design emberlight at nov 11 12am midnight est as of post in 6 hours at qty 50 5 in pol feel free to check it out feel free to follow me here on twitter jascolors on discord jascolors or see profile for link to my discord server to chat or shoot me a dm as a brief reminder my artist shop is at until the shop is taken down 1111 if you want to snag any last pieces for your collection if youre reading this thanks again for all your support and being so awesome

my take on todays episode from a p1 from day 1 most of the feedback on todays episode is that its meant for a very small spacesx crowd i think thats fair but im curious how opinions differ between early and more recent listeners personally the caitdave feud over nothing is part of the kms fabric from the very beginning whether its kelliher mhb carrabiscarano wendysgate kirk wants to find these oddball characters and explore their quirks yes the show had a little more structure in the beginning but this has always been part of the show rico bosco hit the nail on the head years ago this is a show about nothing and everything at the same time

what is lepus most of the time we talk about technology as if its something outside of us faster chips better models smarter systems but what if the real unsolved problem isnt technology but ourselves the way we process feelings in an age that runs faster than we can feel thats where lepus started the name comes from albrecht drers young hare 1502 to me drer was the first person who merged art and mathematics into a single language selfportrait at the age of twenty eight 1500 young hare 1502 he drew with precision but he also wrote algorithms for proportion and geometry he proved that beauty can be logical and logic can be emotional thats the philosophy im continuing with lepus lepus isnt a company yet its a framework for thinking its where we experiment with how we can quantify model and design feelings not to make anything more explainable but to use the desire to explain something as a way to create we are building at the intersection of technology design engineering and human perception we want to understand how emotion behaves when translated into data what we gain what we lose and what that says about who we are in this digital century lepus was never meant to stay personal it began from one persons curiosity but it grows through the curiosity of others the questions it asks about feeling meaning and structure cant be answered in isolation they need conversation contradiction and shared observation lepus should be a community of inquiry not a monument to one mind a space where people who think design build and feel differently can work from the same question how can rationality and empathy coexist as one system we dont think unexplainable feelings are noise theyre signals we will never learn to decode and will act as an unapproachable lighthouse which will lead us forever to explore the unknown thats what lepus is about a way to study feelings with the same seriousness as we research physics and a reminder that logic and empathy dont have to live on opposite sides welcome to lepus

karma is live does anyone has the link to this novel story i was hiding in the car clutching a bottle of champagne ready to surprise my girlfriend on her birthday she was getting closer then i heard two voices not one a mans low and unfamiliar a wave of confusion washed over me i watched frozen as he pressed her against the tinted window of my own ford explorer her gasps fogging the glass from the outside theres a song lyric about being under the car instead of in it right then i understood i saw exactly how wild things could get the worst part i was about to propose and to make sure everyone could share the moment i had set up a private livestream right now both our families all our friends were watching this online 1 chloes eyes met mine through the dark tint but she couldnt see me lets get in the car she whispered her voice breathy a spike of pure panic shot through me the livestream was running through the dashcam if they got in the camera would catch everything and whatever shred of dignity i had left would be incinerated my fingers fumbled as i dialed her number her phone lit up in her hand she saw it was me answered and immediately rushed out hey im in a meeting cant talk before i could say a word she hung up i watched her power the phone off completely a moment later the passenger door opened they fell inside a tangle of limbs and hungry mouths he pushed her back against the seat their kisses wet and desperate it was over the camera was recording it all i was curled up in the trunk space of my own suv paralyzed today was her birthday the plan was simple something you see go viral online shed walk up to the car id pop the trunk from the inside and shed find it filled with roses and gifts id be there on one knee nestled among the flowers holding out a diamond ring it was supposed to be romantic the camera was angled perfectly to capture the joyous surprise on her face our friends and family were all waiting at my apartment the plan was that as soon as i proposed id walk in the door with my new fiance and theyd set off confetti cannons now it was just awkward excruciatingly awkward the livestream was broadcasting the sight of her clothes being peeled away piece by piece by this stranger the man this affair chuckled why didnt you take your boyfriends call scared hell find out chloe kissed him her voice thick with excitement not at all if you want to play that game i can call him right now he laughed a smug ugly sound and pushed her down onto the backseat youre a wild one arent you if were going to chase a thrill she murmured we might as well go all the way they were fully on the backseats now oblivious to me in the trunk i shakily pulled out my own phone my hands trembling the screen showed me a mirror of the livestream the two of them tangled together in my car broadcast to a private room with a password the viewer count was over a hundred i dont have that many friends i knew with a sickening certainty that our guests had started sharing the password the gossip was spreading like a wildfire over a hundred people and not a single comment the silence was deafening i could picture them all sitting in my living room surrounded by cake and confetti cannons just staring in horrified awkward silence at their phones then the worst thing yet i saw one account spamming the stream with digital gifts it was chloes mother my future motherinlaw she kept sending them one after another because each time a gift was sent a gaudy animation would flash across the screen momentarily obscuring the awful view she was oldschool with technology she didnt know there was a button to hide all the effects the poor woman was burning through her retirement savings trying to shield her daughters shame and all for nothing i couldnt stop it the streaming software was running on the cars infotainment system id have to get into the front seat to shut it off just then the man finally noticed something was off wait a second he said pausing why is the car on chloe laughed it off my boyfriends car has a remote start for the ac i turned it on for you before i came down didnt want you to get too hot he sounded impressed my porsche doesnt even have that and it cost over a hundred grand this thing is what thirty she wrapped her arms around his neck pulling his face close for another deep kiss exactly and here you are in his thirtythousanddollar ford sleeping with his girlfriend her words seemed to ignite him he started pulling at her shirt again whispering against her ear god youre something else he lets you drive his car while he takes the subway to work every day and you talk to me like that thats right she purred im a bad girl say it again it just turns me on more hes my simp but im yours then something truly bizarre happened as he kissed her collarbone he started to sing it was an old cheesy rock ballad im forever yours faithfully chloe giggled kissing him back thats right baby thats us i couldnt understand it who sings during something like this maybe it was their own private joke or maybe guys who drive porsches just have that effect on women but it was profoundly deeply cringey especially knowing it was being broadcast live i knew i had to do something it was my account if this went any further if something truly explicit was shown i could be the one facing legal trouble i cleared my throat a small pathetic cough in an instant the two of them shot upright their romantic bubble popped when chloe saw me her face went white youre supposed to be at work she stammered its your birthday i said my voice flat i took the day off i wanted to surprise you how pathetic id taken time off planned everything just for this the strangest part was i didnt feel rage not a single spark of anger a cynical thought had always lived in the back of my mind until youre married youre just sleeping with someone elses future wife well the proposal was off in my eyes she was already his i glanced at my phone again the viewer count was now over a thousand in a passwordprotected room what did that mean it meant the link had been shared with our entire university alumni group our respective company slack channels and every distant cousin and greataunt on both sides of the family a total multiplatform social collapse as if on cue a group of people emerged from the elevator into the parking garage i recognized them chloes coworkers they werent heading to their cars they were clustered together phones in hand staring right at us they had come down for a frontrow seat chloe now in a fullblown panic saw them too she hissed at me dont you dare start a fight with me now my colleagues are right there dont you embarrass me i stared at her dumbfounded youre worried about being embarrassed look you caught me theres no point in pretending she said her tone shifting from panic to ice lets just break up i think i deserve better what did i ever do to you i asked the words feeling hollow she ignored me climbing into the drivers seat and starting the car as she pulled out her voice was cold you were good to me i wont deny that but i deserve better a woman whos ridden in a porsche doesnt go back to a ford the man ryan was awkwardly pulling his clothes back on it was only then that i noticed something crucial a wedding ring on his left hand i pointed at it is that what you call better chloes voice was like steel would you still be saying that if you knew he gives me two thousand dollars a month in cash i sucked in a breath online two grand a month might not sound like a fortune but in our world it was huge my entire monthly takehome pay was barely over four thousand even my thirtygrand suv was financed ryan finished dressing and shot me a look look man i get it name your price ill pay you to keep this quiet and make this a clean break i just stared at him you want to buy my silence its not about buying it he said his voice hardening its about you being required to give it chloe pulled up next to a porsche parked in a reserved spot near the buildings entrance a sign on the space read vp parking only of course she turned to me im warning you leo dont even think about getting revenge by telling everyone hes a vice president from corporate you cant afford to mess with people like him i was stunned not because i was scared of some vp i was stunned because chloes own coworkers were witnesses with the livestream viewership exploding there was no way this story wasnt already scorching its way through their entire company from the local branch to corporate headquarters this guy wasnt just going to lose his promotion he was going to lose his job and id bet anything his wife was already in that chat room theres no way with that many employees watching that someone didnt have her number right on cue ryans phone rang i saw the screen the caller id said wife he instantly declined the call and sent a canned text in a meeting will call you back the phone immediately rang again this time the caller id read chairman ryan clearly didnt dare decline that call he hesitated his face a mask of indecision chloe said nervously its the chairman you should probably answer it could be important ryans eyes darted to me then back to the phone finally he snarled i cant risk it i cant risk what this idiot might say he declined the chairmans call and sent the same text message they were both in the livestream his wife and his boss ryan powered his phone off ill call them back later ill just say my battery died good idea chloe nodded i sighed he shouldnt have turned it off if hed left it on someone might have sent him a text a warning but watching chloe care so much about protecting him a strange numbness settled over me she got out of my car and walked to the back when i popped the trunk my meticulously arranged surprise of balloons and flowers was revealed how pathetic the camera was supposed to capture her ecstatic face now her expression was just cold fitting i suppose we were past all that now look im sorry she said her voice flat take the flowers and the gifts back lets just be clear name a price how much for your silence is that really what you think of me i asked my voice cracking you think id blackmail you over this i just need to be sure he signed a prenup i cant be the reason he loses everything i glanced at ryan his wife was probably already on her way to a lawyers office i took care of you for years i said when youre bending over backward to protect him have you thought about me at all you caught me cheating she snapped her patience gone do i really need to consider your feelings now get real leo i took a deep breath she was right there was no need to consider each others feelings anymore i wasnt going to take their money the moment they sent it it would be extortion and id be the one in jail ive lived a clean life and i wasnt about to start breaking the law now besides what good would my silence do everyone already knew i dont want your money i said and i wont say anything lets just break up ill return the ring she looked surprised i didnt think youd be this cooperative i thought youd make a scene since were breaking up lets make it a clean break lets go back to the apartment so i can pack my things ill be out tonight i shook my head immediately ill pack your things for you dont come up honestly i was trying to protect her our friends and family were in that apartment some were embarrassed some were furious if she walked in there with this guy it would turn into a brawl she could get seriously hurt despite everything the thought of what might happen to her in that apartment terrified me but she didnt see it that way no i have to go back the cash he gave me i hid it im not leaving without it tell me where it is i pleaded ill get it for you suddenly ryan sneered you think were that stupid chloe looked at him confused whats wrong with him getting it you think he doesnt want the money because he has dignity ryan said his eyes locking onto mine hes just afraid of a bank transfer a record that we could use to report him for extortion chloes eyes widened in dawning realization i get it the money you gave me is all cash if he takes it i cant prove how much was there if i call the cops it would just lead back to you ryan nodded a smug look of satisfaction on his face see youre smart chloes face twisted in fury as she turned back to me so thats why you were being so nice you really are the worst kind of snake the poorer the man the more schemes he has i almost fell for it she looked at ryan with a mixture of gratitude and adoration thank god you were here the guys who make it to vp really are on another level i finally understood my honesty was my biggest flaw i was being completely sincere and they had spun it into some machiavelian plot in their own minds and the worst part their paranoid theory was so logical so wellconstructed that even i almost believed it i was about to tell them about the livestream but ryan jabbed a finger in my face you listen to me youre the one who refused the money if you breathe a word of this to anyone do you have any idea what ill do what will you do i asked ill lose everything in the divorce he said his voice dangerously low but believe me before that happens ill set aside a hundred grand ill find someone to break your arms and your legs twenty grand an arm youd be surprised how many people are willing to do that kind of work i couldnt believe it he was threatening me with violence admitting to planning a violent crime and it was all being recorded by the dashcam witnessed by over a thousand people this guy wasnt just going to lose his money in the divorce he was going to prison as i stood there reeling chloe as if she thought i didnt believe him added with a cold smile you should listen to him last month a janitor at the office saw us she tried to shake us down for a lot of money a few days later she was in a car accident do you really think that was a coincidence in that moment the world stopped over a thousand people were watching this livestream and she had just said that out loud if that story was true ryan wasnt just going to jail he was going away for a very long time he gave me one last cold look that coincidence could happen to you too

first impressions from playing over the free weekend over the course of the free weekend i had the opportunity to play for 10 hours and i thought id share my thoughts and perspective as a brand new player jumping in blind no guidance outside of the ingame tutorial background ive never played a city buildersimulator before ive heard about simcity but never played any of those titles growing up for the past decade or so ive heard a lot of good things and universal praise about cities skylines being a modern spiritual successor to the beloved simcity series but ive never tried it in general i do love simulationmanagement games but my experience is limited to rct2 planet coaster planet zoo and jurassic world evolution 2 when cs2 released i was very excited and thought itd be a perfect opportunity to try out a city sim but was disappointed to hear a lot of negative reviews and feedback particularly regarding performance as well as a lack of content compared to cs1 at present being under the impression that the game is now in a better state than at launch i thought the free weekend would be the perfect opportunity to try it out for myself and see if my system could handle it my experience i started by creating a new city in normal mode following the ingame tutorial i think the tutorial is a good starting point to introducing new players to a highlevel overview of most of the ingame systemsmechanicsgeneral gameplay loop having said that it quickly became apparent that there is a lot of depth to this game and the bulk of learning and familiarizing will come with time and experience i learn best by doing so i decided to start a brand new city normal mode again to try and apply and reinforce the basic principles taught in the tutorial as you can see from the screenshots i more or less made things up as i went insert moon knight random bullshit go meme i started my initial approach by building a landfill in one corner of the map a water pump on the corner of the map upstream of the water flow and a sewage output at the other corner of the map downstream of the water flow i built some windmills to generate power and placed them downwind of the airflow i didnt realize this but placement of the windmills matters a lot in some parts of the map they will not be able to reach 100 power generation so i made sure to put them in a spot where theyd fully generate the power they were capable of i also tried to put my industry zone near the edge of the map so that no one has to live too close to the noisy pollution i realize that this is still a tiny town but even after reaching 6k residents i wish that my infrastructure had been a little more organized and wellthoughtout thoughts cs2 pushed my pc 7800x3d rtx 4080 32gb ddr5 6000 to its limits but the performance wasnt nearly as bad as i was expecting it to be especially considering the very demanding 5120x1440 resolution i didnt mess with the graphical settings too much but i did enable dlss on the balanced setting and left the quality settings on high i would say the game averaged around 60fps which felt good that being said im sure performance would slow to a crawl with an actual sizeable city population so i would likely need to adjust my settings in the future as i played i kept learning more and more new things and i had the constant recurring thought next time ill plandoplace xyz differently it became hard to resist the urge to start over and do things better but i committed to growing this first city as much as i could to see how far i could develop it i feel like the cornerstone of this game is built around roads streets and traffic because zones are based off of streets i need to learn which streets are best suited for which districts and how to utilize the available real estate to its full potential the biggest obstacle i ran into was traffic and congestion theres a learning curve here that im eager to explore and it quickly became apparent that no adding long highways throughout the town is not the ideal way to route traffic in fact replacing some of my longer streets with highways quickly broke a lot of my infrastructure due to highways not inherently including powerwatersewage outofthebox i was really interested in specialized industries i definitely went overboard with my wheatcrop industry because i ended up producing hundreds upon hundreds of tons of wheat while my town was only consuming a tiny fraction of that i understand that excess production is exported and sold to neighboringexternal cities but its not clear to me exactly how much income my specialized industry produces i couldnt find it anywhere in my financial statistics overview this made it difficult to determine if it was worthwhile to produce and export so much excess product and i definitely used up a lot of tile spacereal estate that probably would have been better utilized for other zones youll noticed that i also found some land rich in minerals so i purchased a tile and built a mine covering the entire heatmap is this worth the opportunity cost and the tile upkeep cost im still not sure another obstacle i ran into was being able to keep up with the constant demand for housing of all the zones i painted in my town the vast majority were for lowcapacity housing because thats what was most in demand while i wanted to keep industry zones on the outskirts of town i wasnt sure what was the best way to balancedistribute the other zones residential commercial office this resulted in me attempting to distribute residential zones around a centralized commercialadministrative district im positive there are much better ways to plan and optimize the layout but this is the best i could think to do with the time i had once i had nearly taken up all of the available space within my map tiles it became difficult to strategize expansion if i bought more map tiles to the east do i relocate all of my industry to the new borders do i leave the industrial zones where they are and build residential districts on the other side i wasnt sure whether it was better to continue expanding directly off of my existing tiles or whether to purchase distant tiles and start another small town further away to reduce congestion i really appreciated the resident happiness meter tooltip this helped provide some basic guidance and direction regarding areas for improvement i found it difficult to reconcile the happiness measurements with direct feedback given through chirper residents would often complain about things that werent at all reflected in the happiness tooltip i messed up my public transportation mostly as a means to try and reduce traffic congestion i invested in a bus depot i fundamentally misunderstood how to run a bus line assuming this system would simply start working by adding bus stops throughout town after allowing public transportation services to drain my finances for an embarrassingly long time i noticed that there were no actual buses in use and it took me an equally embarrassing amount of time to figure out how to add a bus line route to link all of the stops the simulation runs more slowly than i expected there were times when i needed more funds to build more infrastructure and service buildings but i was hesitant to loan too much money after a while initially worried that the town would quickly descend into chaos i finally began to feel comfortable running the simulation at 3x speed so that income could be generated more quickly and i was spending less time sitting and twiddling my thumbs i didnt run into many bugs from what i could tell the i only issues i were able to notice were two very very minor bugs the first was some occasional flickering when rendering some of the zones but this may or may not be attributed to using dlss the second bug was with rendering the thumbnail for my savegame at one point the thumbnail glitched out and showed a dark red indistinguishable distortion in place of an image overall nothing egregious and as far as i could tell the gameplay experience was largely smooth granted i dont have anything to compare the experience to unlike longtime players of cs1 i love the ui i adore the simplistic clean 2d art style of the user interface while i have barely scraped the surface i appreciate that for the most part i was able to easily find and access everything i needed i appreciate the amount of information that is conveyed through hovertooltips being able to visualize data through indepth charts graphs and sheets was extremely helpful and nice while im sure theres room for improvement thats yet to become apparent to me overall the user experience was a delight that enriched the overall gameplay experience conclusion despite the 10 hours of gameplay essentially serving as an extremely brief crude tutorial more than a proper playthrough i had an absolute blast yes my town is a laughable hot mess but im still proud of what ive built while im sure theres a lot of improvements to be made to bring cs2 up to par with its predecessor as someone who is unable to compare this entry to the decade of development updates and dlc offered by cs1 i could easily see myself sinking hundreds of hours into cs2 im very very hopeful that co will be able to continue development on cs2 and bring it up to par with the expectations of longtime fans of cs1 the rocky premature launch is unfortunate but if development is allowed to continue i could see a bright promising future for this game having ran this on my pc while i wouldnt say the performance is good im somewhat surprised at how not as terrible as i thought the performance is and how relatively bugfree the gameplay appears to be at first glance i know thats a low bar but nonetheless i would now feel very comfortable and confident enough to purchase cs2 when i have the spending money for it i love and appreciate the amount of depth there seems to be i feel as though ive barely even scratched the surface and am now eager to learn and build more tldr while theres plenty of room for improvement its still in my opinion really really engaging overall ive barely scratched the surface i dont know what im doing my initial first impressions are largely positive i really enjoyed getting to try this out over the free weekend look at the jankyass town i built overall a super fun cozy game that scratches the simmanagementbuilder itch i look forward to buying this playing more and learning how to build beautiful wellrun cities thank you for reading my longass post edit sorry for the terrible screenshot quality the screenshots looked a lot better before i uploaded them to reddit

do i belong hi all 32m a bit of interesting background and some questions for you all about a year ago i was approached by two young women on bicycles at the gas station typically i wouldve shut them out but their approach was kind they explained where they were from lds and asked if i wanted to attend a sunday service initially i said yes then i went home researched and realized that i valuedenjoyed smoking cigars watching pornography and open relationships far too much to ever take this seriously a lot has happened this year soul searching questioning lifes meaning wrestling with my values and belief systems a few months ago i got really clear on my values and i realized that smoking porn etc were doing nothing but holding me back i reignited my belief and relationship with god raised catholic i have started feeling a lot better i feel more like myself to be honest ive always tried to live a clean and pure lifestyle but ive struggled with discipline and fear of missing outhaving fun deep down im entrepreneurial and always striving to be the best version of myself but i am unmarried and dont have any friends in close geographical proximity that share my values a few weeks ago a friend mentioned i should check out lds hes not a member but visits utah frequently and stated that their valueslifestyles align a lot with my own i did a bit more digging then yesterday i had this overwhelming feelingattraction toward researching it again it now feels like i need to explore this more deeply today i picked up a copy of the book of mormon and the pearl of great price i told myself that im going to spend the winter reading and understanding the faith before i make any decisions that said is there space for someone like me in the church will i be looked down upon should i decide to follow this path i was baptized catholic as an infant does this prohibit me from integrating into the faith here are my true values antimaterialism service philanthropy i do not drink no longer smoke and am working hard to get porn out of my life entrepreneurial do not believe giving money makes you more favored by god big issue i have with other denominationssystems minimalistic lifestyle bit of a luddite no tv minimal social media i never felt like catholicism pushed me to be a better person i felt like the idea was sin as much as youd like just ask for forgiveness i didnt like that i want some rigidity and conformity to values across a religious community i dont like how loose catholicism is with practice i want something more well defined given this information is this something i should continue to pursue if i do end up at the church in spring would i belong

review limits genuine question about why some people put a limit and the like hello i dont understand why people use the option to limit the number of reviews or get fussy about not being able to clear the backlog i live my spaced rep by a simple tenet new cards are optional but reviews are mandatory lets explore two cases case 1 im a user that believes understands that reviews especially at low intervals should absolutely be cleared on the day or im risking lapses and wrongs i trust the algorithm the algo says i have 200 reviews today so i have 200 cards i should review today to maximise my chances of striking that balance between reviewing more often than necessary and reviewing too rarely which ultimately will likely lead to more reviews anyway if im honest enough to admit to the lapses but today i cant clear them because usually my allocated time is for 150 reviews now why would i want the app to lie to me about the reviews that are actually due today and cap them at 150 its not as if i can bargain with my retention that those 50 reviews that are not being shown today will have the exact same chances of being remembered tomorrow i cant lie to my memory so why would i lie to myself why not go to bed with the awareness of 50 overdue reviews that ill catch up with as soon as i can but at least i have an idea of how behind i am case 2 im a user that believes that i can have a good degree of flexibility about the due review date without it impacting my odds of recollecting the notion same situation my time is for 150 reviews but i have 200 today i close the app but i have 50 still to go but hey i believe that seeing them tomorrow instead of today wont make an iota of a difference to my chances of recollecting them so why worry about it im cool with those 50 ill do them tomorrow and ill ace them as if they had been today why cant i put my money where my mouth is ie theres no need to have 100 punctuality on reviews and not care about the leftovers of the day so i cant understand why people would want to cap the reviews and get to a false end of the session and claim of being even with their schedule when they arent i cant make sense of this reasoning in the two scenarios i was able to picture myself so im asking the kind people of the sub thanks

five nightmares at freddys fnaf 4 rewrite the final chapter the final boss custom night final minigames and secrets chapter 3 disclaimer the following topics discussed in this chapter include slighttransphobia though the latter is unintentional due to the characters not knowing evans new gender and name implied child abuse and major child death if any of these arent your cup of tea you have the right to not read this chapter and never come back introduction to the final chapter so weve finally made it the final chapter of the 4th entry in fnaf rebooted i made sure to save most of the best parts of this game in this final chapter to make sure to give this rewrite of my least favorite game in the series the best content to offer for both older and newer fans alike this chapter goes over some things that i was originally unable to include in chapter 2 but will still include the best parts about it in the 3rd chapter of this story so without further ado lets get started also if you havent read chapters 1 and 2 here are the links to these chapters to get caught up with them before reading this chapter or you can skip it and get to the good shit chapter 1 chapter 2 the final bosses after all these years of mentions foreshadowings and teases i believe its time that i finally stop keeping these two in the dark for too long and introduce to you my rewrite of the 5th night of the 4th instalment of the rebooted series the culmination of the first 4 stories of the first half of rebooteds story that i like to nickname golden nightmare nightmare 5 golden nightmare this is the night with the most amount of changes compared to the original game but as ive said before the nightmare fredbear bossfight in the original fnaf 4 was the inspiration for the final boss fights in most of the games in the series but it being mostly the biggest inspiration for the puppet boss fight in fnaf the golden years which has been technically the true first entry in the rebooted series serving as another half of its origin story with fnmaf being the final half to the piece of the puzzle and to pay homage to my first original fnaf game idea night 5 will have the player go up against the one and only nightmare fredbear who will be rocking a new redesign that takes inspiration from dreadbear which is a reference to the theory that dreadbear was the original fredbear from 1983 that caused the bite but thats not all with this night you will be also going up against nightmare fredbears partner nightmare springbonnie whose appearance is highly similar to pitbonnies from into the pit making this for an epic final boss fight for what was originally the finale to the original story for the series when you begin the night you get one last note from the mysterious helper notes here we are the final nightmare the golden duo will begin hunting when the clock hits 100 am look out for the golden bear shine your light at him to keep him from entering the office faster lure the golden bonnie away from the office with sounds i will be there soon to aid you good luck on this night cassidy i love you if it wasnt obvious the one leaving these messages is none other than evan afton herself who has somehow tied her spirit to cassidys body to help her face her fears and trauma about the incident at fredbears and the mci but more on the first part later the setting of the final night is in a rundown version of the original fredbears family diner with the cameras and audio lure systems from night 1 returning for this final battle with the nightmarish golden duo just like the notes described the only way to survive against nightmare fredbear is by shining the light back at him to slow him down so that you could have enough time to deal with nightmare springbonnie but if you fail to do so and nightmare fredbear reaches the office hides under the desk and watches as the bear leaves the office and goes to the other halfway the only way to tell whenever hes outside the office is through his glowing red eyes imitating the darkness of the halfway if you fail to do this fredbear would pick cassidy up by her neck and proceed to bite her on the head killing her instantly meanwhile with springbonnie you need to lure him away from the office because using all the tactics with fredbear when he does reach the office would not work as springy is slightly smarter than his partner when it comes to the hiding spaces failure to stop him would result in nightmare springy picking the girl and pinning her against the wall before stabbing her with a kitchen knife he was holding repeatedly until the screen gets covered in her blood just like when nightmare chica kills you it should be noted that the game over screens background now includes the darkened image of a girl in a hospital bed covered in bandages around the head with the heart monitor flattening sound being louder than before because there is no way of saving the child thats already dead anymore however there is one more secret i forgot to mention in the night if you look closely whenever youre using the cameras you can see what appears to be some black tentacles with white stripes on them in some parts of the diner using your light will cause them to retreat back into the darkness i think you know who they belong to after beating the nightmare you are then brought over to the final part of the night the final freeroam segment so you are tasked with escaping the clutches of the nightmarish golden duo but they wont let you leave that easily even after 6am when you leave the office nightmare fredbear actually attacks you from behind and cassidy kicks his head off with ease but thanks to the eyes on his chest nightmare fredbear is still able to attack this time with his mouth so you must avoid the headless nightmare creature and the golden rabbit to make it out of the nightmare if you get caught by the headless nightmare you are then brought into his stomach prototype freddy style then again it was already obvious that headless nightmare fredbear was intentionally a reference to him meanwhile with springy its just the same as his jumpscare from before if you die to him during the regular night segment before you leave the diner to end this madness once and for all nightmare springbonnie catches you and is about to finish you once and for all before the tentacles from earlier suddenly appear and wrap around the creatures neck before pulling him back and we hear its gut wrenching shrieks of pain and agony as its attacked by whatever those tendrils belonged to blood begins to drip from the floor and when cassidy shines her light at the thing that killed the nightmare we see a creature with long black hair a poncho that resembles the shirt of a very particular child but has long fingers a skeletal like body with the tentacles on her back but her face is pure white with black wide open eyes sharp teeth and black lipstick with black tears dripping down her face this is none other than nightmarionne or as she is called in this rewrite series nightmarevan upon seeing the creature cassidy shrieks and rushes outside ending the nightmare and this night by extension once and for all but what you are given next is far from a reward flashback minigame 5 october 31th 1983 happiest day dr talbert so you are ready to explain what happened that day on that halloween cassidy yea it started out like any other day you are brought back to the perspective of evan afton once more who is sleeping peacefully in her bed with the fredbear plush right beside her suddenly she is awoken by her alarm clock and she shuts the alarm off at that moment fredbear plushs eyes open and he speaks to her but we all kinda already know who exactly is speaking to her fredbear plush rise and shine little one the day has finally arrived the day of terrors is now here i fear that your brother will no longer be holding back this afternoon so please be careful you pick up the fredbear plush as evan goes to get her costume ready but she is unable to before her brother comes into her room luckily hes unmasked and we see his face micheal dont even think about putting on those girly clothes evan i already have to deal with you being a constant embarrassment to the family dont try to make an excuse and say its for impressing that brooks brat or something but evan doesnt respond to her brothers well unknown to micheal transphobic complaint which confuses the teen micheal uh ev you ok evan i hate you michael the girl then exits her room through the other door in tears of anger meanwhile micheal just stands there thinking back to what he said and we see a hint of regret in his eyes for what he said he tries to follow evan but as he goes to the other door afton opens it as if he were waiting for micheal a look of fear and horror appears on mikes face william you and i need to have a talk boy william then rushes over and kicks mike in the chest as tears fall from the boys eyes the screen fades to black and we return to evans perspective whose face is a horrifying sight to see shes frowning with an angry look in her eyes it almost looks like shes about to snap from all the bullying she has been put through throughout her life and little does she know she is going to snap besides that if you get closer to the door you could hear the sounds of micheals cries in pain from william i dont think i need to explain what is going on you can explore the area and access a new part of the house the attic but well explore that later you can also enter the parents master bedroom and be able to inspect some of the photos in their photo albums in a style similar to undertale yellow the picture you can view is a photo of william and his wifes wedding in which we get the reveal of her name clara along with that we even see some photos of a young micheal afton presumably around evan cassidy and elizabeths age giving flowers to a young girl with curly hair the two blushing in the picture as a result of the offering there is another picture of mike and the mysterious girl but with them holding masks of foxy and chica revealing the girl to have been the chica bully this whole time other pictures include what appears to be the original afton family consisting of the original mr and ms afton along with a their faces though for williams it was more nervous the words on picture say the following billy and jenny best friends forever if youve read the books you would honestly get the idea on who exactly jenny is and its that shes none other than aunt jen from the original novel series see i wanted to at least give off some looks into williams life when he was a child more so than what the original of that back to the story if you explore the rest of the house you can find a few notable things first off elizabeths room is empty but surprisingly clean all thats left is a headless foxy plush and a about what i saw during the events of the missing childrens incident and how william afton my best friends own father was none other than the man behind the slaughtering the minigame truly ends we know now the origins of evan afton and by extension the puppet and why she was the most dangerous and threatening animatronic out of the others this also explains why cassidy had decided to work at fazbears fright to tackle her trauma for one final time and free the spirits of the mci while also confronting the murder of her cousin in fnaf 3 the horror attraction as well as understand more about the story of fnaf rebooted that ive been saving up until this very moment but perhaps some things are best left forgotten for now the notes of dr talbert after cassidy explained the bites true origins and who did the mci explaining the newspapers of fnaf rebooted the game custom night much like with rebooted night 6 is the custom night for this game and is a noncanon challenge mode its gameplay is formatted similarly to the original fnaf 4 but with better audio and gameplay making the nights not so much of a pain as they were before there is a mode called golden mode where nightmare fredbear and springbonnie would be activated on 4 am and replace the other animatronics classic fnaf 4 style there are challenges for each of these just like in fnaf 2 and my rewrite of 3 and each will grant you a star but if you complete the hardest challenge in the game 20202020 mode you would get aaaaaaaaaa the camera pans up to face a wall as it moves slowly and fades into other parts of a mysterious location almost like a facility after checking out the sights for a few more seconds we cut to a man in a black coat wearing a hat and staring at an animatronic he seems to be fixing the robot in question appears to be a clown like animatronic it twitches repeatedly before its eyes light up revealing the colors of blue and green the screen turns dark but the eyes light up in the darkness the show will begin momentarily everyone please stay in your seats we hear a horrifying shriek as the eyes fade away as the clown finishes speaking indicating that she killed the man but you think that the secrets end there oh no thats far from it remember the attic of the afton household well if you were to go to the attic and climb up the latter youll see some old belongings of the afton family like decorations and big boxes but on one of them there is that rat plushie that william was seen holding in his old family photo interacting with the plushie brings you to a secret cutscene the origins of the purple guy secret flashback the screen opens up to what seems to be some kind of employees office with blue colored walls and a purple carpet with an animatronic resembling the puppet lying on a table huh bet yall didnt think id go that far with the fnac 3 references a boy in a purple long sleeve shirt is seen rushing into the room and falling into the floor he we dont see his face at least not until he turns his body around that we see is none other than the young william afton as a child his glasses pushed up a little by the right and we see tears in his eyes he begins crying on the floor the purple nerd why just why did my family think that it was a good idea to bring me here dont they realize that i dont like this place nobody can understand my pain nobody not mother not father not jane not even jenny can understand my pain and henry is just too much of a goodie two shoes to stand up for me unlike his sister the nerd cries for a few more seconds does this behavior sound familiar the purple nerd worst of all my sisters bullying just got worse she and her friends have been teasing me for far too long and now that rat is hunting me down how can my birthday get any worse suddenly an actor in the rat costume comes in and spots the child on the floor the rat aha i got you kid looks like you lost the hide and seek challenge uh kid the purple nerd william doesnt respond to the rats words and instead stares at the actor in the suit suddenly the environment begins to warp as we see william beginning to hallucinate in place of the actor is the monster rat from fnac 3 who taunts the boy for trying to get away from him and slowly begins walking towards him ready to finish him in a panic william cries harder and harder and spots a nearby metal bat and goes into the defensive position but by the time the rat got too close bang bang bang crunch crunch crunch when it all comes clearer all that we see is a once small innocent boy now standing over the corpse of an innocent man his head crushed underneath the mask blood all over williams bat hands the mask of the actor and on the floor the boys expression is unreadable but he drops the bat and steps back possibly horrified by what hes done the purple guy w what no nonononono ii didnt mean suddenly he hears someone coming to the room having heard the commotion and thus william goes to hide under the table where the puppet lookalike lies the cat actor comes in and is horrified by what he sees the cat oh my god can you hear me who who would do this i need to call the police they need to know about what happened as soon as possible the actor then rushes to the phone trying to call the police but he didnt notice the young murderer slowly coming out of the table and grabbing the bat preparing to kill his next target for he cannot let anyone find out about what he did the purple guy im sorry cat but i have no choice the cat wwha bang bang crunch crunch the cutscene ends conclusion so thats it for my version of fnaf 4 i really wanted to make sure that i went all out with making this the best version of the 4th game the community has ever seen i hope you all enjoy the story as i wanted to give backstories to both my take on the puppet and william afton which is why i included that reference to fnac 3 with him does this mean that i would rewrite the fnac franchise maybe but thats up for you guys to decide if i should its been a crazy journey trying to get this chapter done before the 10th of november youve may have noticed the format ive used for this rewrite of the 4th
